position: Digital Marketing Associate for Dicoding Jobs
description:
Job Description


You will work at Dicoding, a company that provides globally recognized online education in the IT & programming sector and handles various developer events together with companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM and Line.


Due to the quality of its curriculum, Dicoding has been accredited as the only Google Developers Authorized Training Partner in Indonesia and has partnered with various government agencies and top companies to provide hundreds of thousands of scholarships across Indonesia.


Dicoding is not just a workplace but a place to have the opportunity to help build Indonesia's bright future.


We are looking for people who have the same passion!


As a Digital Marketing Associate for Dicoding Jobs, you will be part of a new exciting team that will market our new service in connecting digital talents (graduates of Dicoding) with hiring companies.


Your work will include,

  • Being responsible for all matters related to the marketing and branding of the new service in the social media platform.
  • Being involved in all phases of social media from brainstorming, execution, and observation to gain insights.
  • Being the face of the new serviceâ€™s social media platform.
  • Developing a plan for the promotion through digital channels.
  • Creating marketing campaign plans on digital channels as a whole.
  • Creating concepts and designing the distribution of content marketing campaigns on social media.
  • Maintaining and increasing product customer engagement through content delivery on social media.
  • Providing responses to any user's engagement on social media (comments, direct message, complaints, input, etc).
  • Measuring the success of marketing campaigns and showing the level of success of a campaign against the KPIs to be achieved (calculating ROI, etc.)
  • Conducting research to see advertising and market trends.
  • Ensuring content marketing goes in line with the company's marketing strategy.
  • Collaborating with other forms of marketing to execute marketing strategies across all social media channels.
  • Creating and editing digital marketing content when required. We have a team of designers that will support you in creating the visuals however you will need to be able to do adjustments in design (through Figma) when required.


This position will be based in Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan.


Qualifications


  • Graduated from a reputable university. Majoring in Communications, IT or related fields is preferred.
  • A plus if you are highly knowledgeable in the services provided by Dicoding.
  • Active social media user especially on Instagram and TikTok.
  • Tech-savvy and following trends.
  • Have strong knowledge about digital marketing (e.g. search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), content marketing, email marketing, video marketing, and social media ads)
  • Has high creativity as evidenced by portfolio & experience in designing social media content that can engage, inform and motivate.
  • Able to use Figma to create and edit content.
  • Have good sensitivity in terms of identifying the target audience.
  • Have teamwork and time management skills.
  • Have strong copywriting skills.
  • Very good communicator.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan


Sebagai [Posisi Lowongan], Anda akan berpartisipasi dalam proses pembangunan aplikasi yang sedang dibangun di dalam perusahaan [Nama Perusahaan]. Anda juga diharapkan mampu bekerja di dalam tim.


Responsibilities


  • Membuat atau memodifikasi program yang sudah ada.
  • Bertanggung jawab dalam mengelola program.

Job Description

Test


You will work at Dicoding, a company that provides globally recognized online education in the IT & programming sector and handles various developer events together with companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM and Line.


Due to the quality of its curriculum, Dicoding has been accredited as the only Google Developers Authorized Training Partner in Indonesia and has partnered with various government agencies and top companies to provide hundreds of thousands of scholarships across Indonesia.


Dicoding is not just a workplace but a place to have the opportunity to help build Indonesia's bright future.


We are looking for people who have the same passion!


As a Digital Marketing Associate for Dicoding Jobs, you will be part of a new exciting team that will market our new service in connecting digital talents (graduates of Dicoding) with hiring companies. You will be building our new social media from the ground up.


Your work will include,

  • Being responsible for all matters related to the marketing and branding of the new service in the social media platform.
  • Being involved in all phases of social media from brainstorming, execution, and observation to gain insights.
  • Being the face of the new serviceâ€™s social media platform.
  • Developing a plan for the promotion through digital channels.
  • Creating marketing campaign plans on digital channels as a whole.
  • Creating concepts and designing the distribution of content marketing campaigns on social media.
  • Maintaining and increasing product customer engagement through content delivery on social media.
  • Providing responses to any user's engagement on social media (comments, direct message, complaints, input, etc). 
  • Measuring the success of marketing campaigns and showing the level of success of a campaign against the KPIs to be achieved (calculating ROI, etc.)
  • Conducting research to see advertising and market trends.
  • Ensuring content marketing goes in line with the company's marketing strategy.
  • Collaborating with other forms of marketing to execute marketing strategies across all social media channels.
  • Creating and editing digital marketing content when required. We have a team of designers that will support you in creating the visuals however you will need to be able to do adjustments in design (through Figma) when required.


This position will be based in Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan.


Qualifications


  • Graduated from a reputable university. Majoring in Communications, IT or related fields is preferred.
  • Highly knowledgeable in the services provided by Dicoding. A plus if you are a graduate of a Dicoding program (such as Bangkit, SIB, IDCamp, and others).
  • Active social media user especially on Instagram and TikTok.
  • Tech-savvy and following trends.
  • Have strong knowledge about digital marketing (e.g. search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), content marketing, email marketing, video marketing, and social media ads)
  • Has high creativity as evidenced by portfolio & experience in designing social media content that can engage, inform and motivate.
  • Able to use Figma to create and edit content.
  • Have good sensitivity in terms of identifying the target audience.
  • Have teamwork and time management skills.
  • Have strong copywriting skills.
  • Very good communicator.

Job Description


You will work at Dicoding, a company that provides globally recognized online education in the IT & programming sector and handles various developer events together with companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM and Line.


Due to the quality of its curriculum, Dicoding has been accredited as the only Google Developers Authorized Training Partner in Indonesia and has partnered with various government agencies and top companies to provide hundreds of thousands of scholarships across Indonesia.


Dicoding is not just a workplace but a place to have the opportunity to help build Indonesia's bright future.


We are looking for people who have the same passion!


As a Office Officer, you will be responsible for carrying out operational, administrative, and support tasks for a project.


Your work will include,

Planning, preparing, and executing program activities.

Regularly monitoring, tracking, and analyzing program data.

  • Collaborating with related teams and stakeholders.
  • Providing comprehensive and extensive reports.

Being the point of contact for external stakeholders

  • Being responsive to stakeholder requests.
  • Taking initiative and being proactive during program implementation.
  • Coordinating and being responsible for routine reporting.
  • Willing to work outside of office hours (can be done from home during non-office hours).
  • Fast-response and available to be contacted outside of office hours.


This position will be based in Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan.


Qualification


  • Male/Female, aged 18-26 years old.
  • Graduated from a reputable university.
  • Not currently pursuing further education.
  • Fresh graduates are welcome.
  • Experience as a project officer, project operations, or project manager is a plus.
  • Must have basic skills in word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation applications. The recruitment process will be accompanied by various tasks to assess these skills.
  • Tech-savvy. Dicoding is an online training/education company and partners with world-class companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM, and others, so every employee must be tech-savvy.
  • Understands data privacy, Personally Identifiable Information, and can respect the privacy of each stakeholder.
  • Fully vaccinated for Covid and booster.
  • Holds an English language certificate (TOEIC/TOEFL/IELTS) and is proficient in English is a plus.
  • Performance will be evaluated every month.

Deskripsi

IT Support, Networking, Logistics,

Syarat

  • Pria, usia Bebas, berdomisili Bandung. Sudah vaksin COVID-19 secara penuh. 
  • Memiliki pendidikan yang berhubungan dengan Teknik Informatika / Komputer / Jaringan atau dapat membuktikan kapabilitas dengan portofolio dan/atau sertifikasi.
  • Ijazah minimal SMA/SMK/setara dan tidak sedang menempuh pendidikan (boleh sedang menunggu wisuda/kelulusan).
  • Memahami komponen, mampu melakukan instalasi, deployment, dan troubleshooting ringan terkait 
  • Hardware teknologi (komputer, laptop, smartphone, printer, scanner, dll).
  • Software secara umum (Operating System, Office, basic working tools, dll).
  • Jaringan (topologi, crimping, IP addressing, subnetting, routing, mesh network) dan mampu melakukan monitoring pada sejumlah perangkat jaringan serta IoT Devices.
  • Mampu melakukan pencatatan dan dokumentasi inventory (barang masuk-keluar, pengelolaan spare-part, consumables, inventory planning, dll)
  • Mampu bekerja sama, enerjik dan proaktif.
  • Nilai plus jika:
  • memiliki SIM C dan A.
  • memiliki sertifikasi dalam bidang IT Support, Mikrotik, Network Management
  • memiliki pengalaman mengelola jaringan atau sistem dengan 100 perangkat.
  • memiliki sertifikat Bahasa Inggris (TOEIC/TOEFL/IELTS) atau bisa berbahasa Inggris aktif.


Job Description

  • IT Helpdesk untuk permasalahan hardware, software, dan jaringan
  • Melakukan deployment, merawat, dan memonitor hardware teknologi (komputer, laptop, smartphone, printer, scanner, dll) dan software yang menyertainya (update, reinstalls OS, factory reset).
  • Melakukan monitoring, optimasi, dan troubleshooting pada perangkat jaringan.
  • Mencatat dan mendata inventory.
  • Bersedia bekerja diluar waktu office-hours (insidental)
  • Fast-response dan dapat dihubungi diluar waktu office-hours.


Benefit

  • Gaji pokok minimal UMR Kota Bandung
  • Peralatan pendukung pekerjaan (laptop, handphone, dll)
  • Makan siang
  • BPJS Kesehatan dan Ketenagakerjaan
  • Training untuk mendukung pekerjaan

Deskripsi

IT Automation OfficerBerikut syarat dan ketentuan sebagai IT Automation Officer

Syarat

  • Pria/Wanita, usia Bebas, berdomisili atau bersedia pindah ke Bandung
  • Memiliki pendidikan yang berhubungan dengan IT Automation, Scripting, Teknik Informatika/Komputer/Jaringan atau dapat membuktikan kapabilitas dengan portofolio proyek dan/atau sertifikasi.
  • Ijazah minimal SMA/SMK/Setara
  • Tidak sedang menempuh pendidikan (boleh sedang menunggu wisuda/kelulusan).
  • Memahami bahasa pemrograman dan prinsip otomasi, routines, dan scheduler.
  • Preferensi Bahasa: Python, Javascript/Typescript, Bash Script, Go
  • Wajib memiliki pemahaman proses bisnis dan skill dasar pengolah kata (word processor), pengolah angka (spreadsheet), Aplikasi Presentasi (slides/powerpoint) dan reporting/pelaporan
  • Memahami privasi data, Personally Identifiable Information dan dapat menghargai privasi setiap stakeholder.
  • Mampu bekerja sama, enerjik dan proaktif.
  • Nilai plus jika
  • memiliki sertifikasi dalam bidang terkait.
  • memiliki pengalaman mengelola otomasi atau dapat menunjukkan portofolio (misal github).
  • memiliki sertifikat Bahasa Inggris (TOEIC/TOEFL/IELTS) dan bisa berbahasa Inggris aktif.
  • aktif dalam komunitas dan/atau forum diskusi.


Job Description

  • Mempelajari, menjalankan, memodifikasi, dan mengelola proses otomasi yang sudah dipersiapkan dan berjalan
  • Memonitor dan menyiapkan statistik dari otomasi yang dijalankan
  • Mengkonsepkan dan mengimplementasi fungsi atau otomasi yang dapat membuat proses bisnis berjalan dengan lebih efisien
  • Berkomunikasi dengan tim program dan atau tim produk serta menjadi jembatan komunikasi dalam hal-hal yang bersifat teknis.


Benefit

  • Gaji pokok minimal UMR Kota Bandung
  • Peralatan pendukung pekerjaan (laptop, handphone, dll)
  • Makan siang
  • BPJS Kesehatan dan Ketenagakerjaan
  • Training untuk mendukung pekerjaan

Job Description

You will work at Dicoding, a company that provides globally recognized online education in the IT & programming sector and handles various developer events together with companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM and AWS.

Due to the quality of its curriculum, Dicoding has been accredited as a Google Developers Authorized Training Partner, Google Cloud Partner, and Google for Education Partner in Indonesia and has partnered with various government agencies and top companies to provide hundreds of thousands of scholarships across Indonesia.

Dicoding is not just a workplace but a place to have the opportunity to help build Indonesia's bright future.

Dicoding Indonesia requires individuals to assist the Business Dicoding team in managing all event activities at Dicoding. For this reason, an Event Coordinator who can handle end-to-end events is needed.

As an Event Coordinator, you will be responsible for planning, organizing, and executing various events, including defining event objectives, developing event plans, coordinating logistics, managing vendors, overseeing marketing and promotions, and ensuring the smooth running of events.

Job Description


You will work at Dicoding, a company that provides globally recognized online education in the IT & programming sector and handles various developer events together with companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM and Line.


Due to the quality of its curriculum, Dicoding has been accredited as the only Google Developers Authorized Training Partner in Indonesia and has partnered with various government agencies and top companies to provide hundreds of thousands of scholarships across Indonesia.


Dicoding is not just a workplace but a place to have the opportunity to help build Indonesia's bright future.


We are looking for people who have the same passion!


As a Office Officer, you will be responsible for carrying out operational, administrative, and support tasks for a project.


Your work will include,

Planning, preparing, and executing program activities.

Regularly monitoring, tracking, and analyzing program data.

  • Collaborating with related teams and stakeholders.
  • Providing comprehensive and extensive reports.

Being the point of contact for external stakeholders

  • Being responsive to stakeholder requests.
  • Taking initiative and being proactive during program implementation.
  • Coordinating and being responsible for routine reporting.
  • Willing to work outside of office hours (can be done from home during non-office hours).
  • Fast-response and available to be contacted outside of office hours.


This position will be based in Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan.


Qualification


  • Male/Female, aged 18-26 years old.
  • Graduated from a reputable university.
  • Not currently pursuing further education.
  • Fresh graduates are welcome.
  • Experience as a project officer, project operations, or project manager is a plus.
  • Must have basic skills in word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation applications. The recruitment process will be accompanied by various tasks to assess these skills.
  • Tech-savvy. Dicoding is an online training/education company and partners with world-class companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM, and others, so every employee must be tech-savvy.
  • Understands data privacy, Personally Identifiable Information, and can respect the privacy of each stakeholder.
  • Fully vaccinated for Covid and booster.
  • Holds an English language certificate (TOEIC/TOEFL/IELTS) and is proficient in English is a plus.
  • Performance will be evaluated every month.

Job Description


You will work at Dicoding, a company that provides globally recognized online education in the IT & programming sector and handles various developer events together with companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM and Line.


Due to the quality of its curriculum, Dicoding has been accredited as the only Google Developers Authorized Training Partner in Indonesia and has partnered with various government agencies and top companies to provide hundreds of thousands of scholarships across Indonesia.


Dicoding is not just a workplace but a place to have the opportunity to help build Indonesia's bright future.


We are looking for people who have the same passion!


As a Office Officer, you will be responsible for carrying out operational, administrative, and support tasks for a project.


Your work will include,

Planning, preparing, and executing program activities.

Regularly monitoring, tracking, and analyzing program data.

  • Collaborating with related teams and stakeholders.
  • Providing comprehensive and extensive reports.

Being the point of contact for external stakeholders

  • Being responsive to stakeholder requests.
  • Taking initiative and being proactive during program implementation.
  • Coordinating and being responsible for routine reporting.
  • Willing to work outside of office hours (can be done from home during non-office hours).
  • Fast-response and available to be contacted outside of office hours.


This position will be based in Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan.


Qualification


  • Male/Female, aged 18-26 years old.
  • Graduated from a reputable university.
  • Not currently pursuing further education.
  • Fresh graduates are welcome.
  • Experience as a project officer, project operations, or project manager is a plus.
  • Must have basic skills in word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation applications. The recruitment process will be accompanied by various tasks to assess these skills.
  • Tech-savvy. Dicoding is an online training/education company and partners with world-class companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM, and others, so every employee must be tech-savvy.
  • Understands data privacy, Personally Identifiable Information, and can respect the privacy of each stakeholder.
  • Fully vaccinated for Covid and booster.
  • Holds an English language certificate (TOEIC/TOEFL/IELTS) and is proficient in English is a plus.
  • Performance will be evaluated every month.

As a Marketing Communication Associate for Dicoding Jobs, you will be in charge of marketing, branding, and communications for the Dicoding Jobs service which connects tech & digital talents (graduates of Dicoding) with hiring companies.

Important notes:

  • You will be part of a small new team (less than 1 year old).
  • Therefore you will be provided the ability to explore different marketing tactics/strategies, innovate, and test your marketing theories.
  • You will be given the opportunity to build marketing and communications for Dicoding Jobs, from the groud up.
  • And we are willing to invest in your development as a marketing & communications associate (company paid courses / learning opportunities).
  • This position will be based in Kebayoran Square Business Park, Bintaro, Tangerang Selatan.


Your work will include,

  • Being responsible for all matters related to the marketing and branding of Dicoding Jobs and its various campaigns & events.
  • Being involved in all phases of marketing & communication from brainstorming, execution, and observation to gain insights.
  • Being the face of Dicoding Job's social media platform.
  • Developing a plan for the promotion through various channels including digital channels.
  • Creating marketing campaign plans in various channels as a whole.
  • Creating concepts and designing the distribution of content marketing campaigns.
  • Maintaining and increasing product customer engagement through marketing content delivery.
  • Providing responses to any user's engagement on social media (comments, direct message, complaints, input, etc).
  • Measuring the success of marketing campaigns and showing the level of success of a campaign against the KPIs to be achieved (calculating ROI, etc.)
  • Conducting research to see advertising and market trends.
  • Ensuring content marketing goes in line with the company's marketing strategy.
  • Collaborating with other forms of marketing to execute marketing strategies across all channels.
  • Creating and editing digital marketing content when required. We have a team of designers that will support you in creating the visuals however you will need to be able to do adjustments in design (through Figma) when required.
  • Create company literature and other forms of communication.
  • Create marketing and promotional materials, both print and electronic.
  • Copyedit, proofread, and revise communications.


Required Qualifications

  • Graduated from a reputable university. Majoring in Communications, IT or related fields is preferred.
  • A plus if you are highly knowledgeable in the services provided by Dicoding.
  • Active social media user especially on Instagram and TikTok.
  • Tech-savvy and following trends.
  • Have strong knowledge about digital marketing (e.g. search engine optimization (SEO), search engine marketing (SEM), content marketing, email marketing, video marketing, and social media ads).
  • Has high creativity as evidenced by portfolio & experience in designing content that can engage, inform and motivate.
  • Able to use Figma to create and edit content.
  • Have good sensitivity in terms of identifying the target audience.
  • Have teamwork and time management skills.
  • Have strong copywriting skills. Capable of creating great articles.
  • Very good communicator.


Salary & Benefits

  • Standard BPJS insurance.
  • Professional development support (educational expenses).


Recruitment Process

  1. Apply to this position.
  2. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted to complete an online administrative application form.
  3. Selected candidates will be contacted for interview rounds with the management through online video call.

Job Description

You will work at Dicoding, a company that provides globally recognized online education in the IT & programming sector and handles various developer events together with companies such as Google, Microsoft, IBM and AWS.

Due to the quality of its curriculum, Dicoding has been accredited as a Google Developers Authorized Training Partner, Google Cloud Partner, and Google for Education Partner in Indonesia and has partnered with various government agencies and top companies to provide hundreds of thousands of scholarships across Indonesia.

Dicoding is not just a workplace but a place to have the opportunity to help build Indonesia's bright future.

We are looking for people who have the same passion!

As a Product Engineer, you will be joining the Product & Engineering team in building impactful products for Dicoding users. With your programming skills, you will be responsible for creating great experiences for our users.

We are looking for an engineer, who not only knows how to program with good functionality, but also solves user problems. When building dicoding.com, we always try to:

  • Give maximum impact from the solutions we built.
  • Live a balanced life (it is important for engineers to sleep well).


Therefore, we are always exploring and implementing product development approaches to achieve those 2 goals. Some of them are:

  • Always design the system at every stage of development.
  • Practicing Test-Driven Development (TDD).
  • Write code that communicates its intent clearly and is easily understood by fellow engineers.
  • Building an architecture that reflects user behavior as much as possible.
  • Applying blameless postmortem, when something unexpected happened.
  • Shorten the feedback flow between various stakeholders.


However, we always open our doors to evaluate and improve those approaches. The ultimate goal is to build solutions that improve the quality of life of Dicoding users.

If you are interested in solving problems with those approaches or share some of yours in achieving our goal, then join us at Dicoding Indonesia. We build a collaborative digital ecosystem, so that Indonesian developers can win in our own country.


Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with designers and other stakeholders in analyzing problems and solutions to be built.
  • Develop and manage the dicoding.com platform.
  • Ensure all systems and components on dicoding.com run properly.
  • Write well-designed, easy-to-test, efficient, and clean code on both the front-end and back-end.


Requirements

When it comes to requirements, at Dicoding, we have no limitations on specific tools or technologies. We are open to any technology and tools that can meet the business needs and provide the best solutions for our users. With that in mind, here are the general requirements for a Product Engineer at Dicoding:

  • Proficiency in Git and Unix-based systems.
  • Good knowledge of web technologies.
  • Want to follow and learn the development culture in Dicoding: Test Driven Development.
  • Able to understand the requirements of a solution that will be built properly.
  • Having a growth mindset and high curiosity.


So, what are the specific requirements for the technology or tools currently used at Dicoding?

At Dicoding, we currently maintain and continuously innovate on two flagship products: the learning platform (dicoding.com) and the jobs platform (jobs.dicoding.com). We are looking for an engineer who:

  • Writes PHP and Javascript proficiently.
  • Has good knowledge of Laravel framework and MySQL database.
  • Is familiar with Bootstrap and extends it properly.


As for Dicoding Jobs, we also welcome applicants who is more into Front-End engineering and have the following criteria:

  • Strong experience with React and Next.js.
  • Experience in E2E testing using Playwright.
  • Experience with Typescript is a plus, but not mandatory.


If you believe you are the one weâ€™re looking for, then please apply without hesitation.


Nice to Haves

  • Experience in building web-based products or contributing to open source projects.
  • Good communication and collaboration skills.
  • Open to receive feedback from others.
  • Confident and trustworthy personality.
  • Having basic research skills is a plus.

We are looking for like-minded talent who share the same passion!

As a Program Officer, your main task is to administer, do hands-on program operations, and do communications and reporting for internal or external campaign partner stakeholders.

Job Descriptions

As a Product Designer, you will be joining the Product & Engineering team in building quality and useful products for Dicoding users. With your ability and sense of design, you will be responsible for creating an outstanding user experience.

We are looking for a designer who does not only make designs that are good or pleasing to the visual side but also can solve user problems.

Responsibilities

  • Translating the platform or business problem into actionable insight.
  • Conduct usability testing and user research.
  • Collaborate with engineers and other stakeholders in analyzing a solution to be built.
  • Translating high-level business requirements into the design plan.
  • Monitoring, identifying, and resolving UX issues.
  • Improve the UI on the Dicoding website.


Requirements

  • Understand how to plan and conduct design research (Quantitative and Qualitative).
  • Having good knowledge using Figma design tool.
  • Have the courage to pour creative thinking into articulating design decisions.
  • Having a growth mindset and high curiosity.
  • Want to live a healthy and balanced life.

  • Experience in crafting designs for web-based products.
  • Understand the design process in the industry and keep up with design trends.
  • Have a good knowledge of the design system.
  • Have good illustration skills.
  • Having experience working in a software development environment.
  • Good communication and collaboration skills.
  • Be open to receiving feedback from others.
  • Confident and trustworthy personality.

We are looking for an engineer, who not only knows how to program with good functionality, but also solves user problems. When building dicoding.com, we always try to:

  • Give maximum impact from the solutions we built.
  • Live a balanced life (it is important for engineers to sleep well).

Therefore, we are always exploring and implementing product development approaches to achieve those 2 goals. Some of them are:

  • Always design the system at every stage of development.
  • Practicing Test-Driven Development (TDD).
  • Write code that communicates its intent clearly and is easily understood by fellow engineers.
  • Building an architecture that reflects user behavior as much as possible.
  • Applying blameless postmortem, when something unexpected happened.
  • Shorten the feedback flow between various stakeholders.

However, we always open our doors to evaluate and improve those approaches. The ultimate goal is to build solutions that improve the quality of life of Dicoding users.

If you are interested in solving problems with those approaches or share some of yours in achieving our goal, then join us at Dicoding Indonesia. We build a collaborative digital ecosystem, so that Indonesian developers can win in our own country.


Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with designers and other stakeholders in analyzing problems and solutions to be built.
  • Develop and manage the dicoding.com platform.
  • Ensure all systems and components on dicoding.com run properly.
  • Write well-designed, easy-to-test, efficient, and clean code on both the front-end and back-end.


Requirements

  • Proficiency in PHP, Laravel, Git and Unix-based systems.
  • Good knowledge of web technologies.
  • Have a good knowledge of MySQL databases.
  • Want to follow and learn the development culture in Dicoding: Test Driven Development.
  • Able to understand the requirements of a solution that will be built properly.
  • Having a growth mindset and high curiosity.
  • Want to live a healthy and balanced life.


Nice to Haves

  • Experience in building web-based products or contributing to open source projects.
  • Good communication and collaboration skills.
  • Open to receiving feedback from others.
  • Confident and trustworthy personality.
  • Having basic research skills is a plus.

Job Descriptions

As a Product Engineer, you will be joining Product Engineering team in building impactful products for Dicoding users. With your programming skills, you will be responsible for creating great experiences for our users.

We are looking for an engineer, who not only knows how to program with good functionality, but also solves user problems. When building dicoding.com, we always try to:

  • Give maximum impact from the solutions we built.
  • Live a balanced life (it is important for engineers to sleep well).

Therefore, we are always exploring and implementing product development approaches to achieve those 2 goals. Some of them are:

  • Always design the system at every stage of development.
  • Practicing Test-Driven Development (TDD).
  • Write code that communicates its intent clearly and is easily understood by fellow engineers.
  • Building an architecture that reflects user behavior as much as possible.
  • Applying blameless postmortem, when something unexpected happened.
  • Shorten the feedback flow between various stakeholders.

However, we always open our doors to evaluate and improve those approaches. The ultimate goal is to build solutions that improve the quality of life of Dicoding users.

If you are interested in solving problems with those approaches or share some of yours in achieving our goal, then join us at Dicoding Indonesia. We build a collaborative digital ecosystem, so that Indonesian developers can win in our own country.


Responsibilities

  • Collaborate with designers and other stakeholders in analyzing problems and solutions to be built.
  • Develop and manage the dicoding.com platform.
  • Ensure all systems and components on dicoding.com run properly.
  • Write well-designed, easy-to-test, efficient, and clean code on both the front-end and back-end.


Requirements

  • Proficiency in PHP, Laravel, Git and Unix-based systems.
  • Good knowledge of web technologies.
  • Have a good knowledge of MySQL databases.
  • Want to follow and learn the development culture in Dicoding: Test Driven Development.
  • Able to understand the requirements of a solution that will be built properly.
  • Having a growth mindset and high curiosity.
  • Want to live a healthy and balanced life.


Nice to Haves

  • Experience in building web-based products or contributing to open source projects.
  • Good communication and collaboration skills.
  • Open to receiving feedback from others.
  • Confident and trustworthy personality.
  • Having basic research skills is a plus.

Syarat

  • Pria/Wanita usia 18-30 tahun, 
  • Lulusan SMA/SMK sederajat & Universitas jurusan apapun.
  • Pengalaman bekerja minimal 1 (satu) tahun sebagai program/ project/ campaign/ volunteership manager dalam bidang apapun
  • Tidak sedang menempuh pendidikan (boleh sedang menunggu wisuda/kelulusan)
  • Wajib memiliki skill dasar pengolah kata (wordprocessor), pengolah angka (spreadsheet), Aplikasi Presentasi (slides/powerpoint) dan reporting/pelaporan
  • Tech-savvy. Dicoding adalah perusahaan pelatihan/edukasi daring dan bermitra dengan perusahaan dunia: Google, Microsoft, IBM, dan lainnya.
  • Memahami privasi data, Personally Identifiable Information dan dapat menghargai privasi setiap stakeholder.
  • Memahami dan menjalankan protokol kesehatan terkait COVID-19 termasuk social-distancing. Sudah divaksin adalah nilai plus.
  • Domisili di Bandung dan sekitarnya atau bersedia pindah ke Bandung.
  • Bekerja WFO Shifting (selama PPKM) / Full-WFO (pasca PPKM)

Ketentuan

  • Lowongan ini bukan merupakan magang akademik.
  • Memiliki sertifikat Bahasa Inggris (TOEIC/TOEFL/IELTS) dan bisa berbahasa inggris aktif adalah nilai plus
  • Performa akan dievaluasi setiap bulan.

Job Description

  • Melakukan perencanaan, persiapan, dan eksekusi aktivitas program di Dicoding yang akan dibantu oleh Program Officer. 
  • Monitoring, Tracking, Analyzing data campaign secara berkala.
  • Berkolaborasi dengan team terkait dan stakeholder
  • Memberikan laporan lengkap/ekstensif 
  • Menjadi Point-of-Contact dari Stakeholder External
  • Responsif terhadap request yang diberikan stakeholder
  • Memiliki inisiatif dan proaktif saat pengerjaan program
  • Berkoordinasi dan memiliki tanggung jawab pelaporan secara rutin
  • Bersedia bekerja diluar waktu office-hours (dapat dilakukan dari rumah)
  • Fast-response dan dapat dihubungi diluar waktu office-hours.

Benefit

  • Gaji, Penggantian Transportasi & Pulsa / Internet
  • Dapat menggunakan fasilitas kantor Dicoding selama bekerja di kantor â€“ (sepeda/sepeda listrik, internet, free flow coffee/tea, makan siang)
  • Diutamakan dalam rekrutmen full-time employee.

Software Engineer

Unit kerja Solution Engineering bertanggung jawab untuk mengembangkan serta menyempurnakan perangkat lunak

Kualifikasi

  • Memiliki Pengalaman 1-3 Tahun.
  • Memiliki pemahaman Object Oriented Programming (OOP) Minimal dalam satu bahasa pemograman.
  • Memiliki Pengetahuan MS SQL, Postgre atau Database Lainnya.
  • Memiliki Pengetahuan tentang Restful API dan Windows Services.
  • Memiliki pengetahuan mengenai Microservices adalah nilai plus.
  • Memahami siklus SDLC.
  • Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik.

Kualifikasi untuk jabatan ini adalah:

Software Quality Assurance

Unit kerja Software Quality Assurance bertanggung jawab dalam melakukan testing serta menjaga kualitas perangkat lunak/software

Kualifikasi

1. Minimum D3 / S1 diutamakan

2. Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1-3 tahun sebagai Software Quality Assurance , Software Tester

3. Memiliki pemahaman siklus pengembangan perangkat lunak seperti : agile & DevOps.

4. Memiliki pemahaman mengenai metode testing perangkat lunak seperti : manual testing, automations testing, API Testing, Mobile Testing, Web Testing.

5. Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi dengan baik.

6. Memiliki pengalaman programming atau membuat automation testing adalah nilai plus.

7. memiliki pemahaman tentang ISO 8583 adalah nilai plus.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

IT Customer Success

Unit kerja Customer Success bertanggung jawab untuk menangani dan memberikan pelayanan serta informasi atas permintaan dan keluhan tentang produk yang dihadapi oleh klien dan Mitra.

Kualifikasi untuk jabatan ini adalah:

1. Minimal D3/ S1.

2. Mengerti dan mampu menjalankan remote desktop, radmin, tcp/ip, ping, telnet, tracert.

3. Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi yang baik.

Responsibilities

1. Melakukan pencatatan laporan terkait permintaan (informasi/data) ataupun keluhan. Pencatatan dilakukan pada aplikasi Azure.

2. Menerima dan menangani dengan baik setiap permintaan (informasi/data) atau keluhan dari  Mitra atas semua bisnis/service/produk Arranet yang disampaikan melalui media whatsapp, telepon, dan email. 

3. Melakukan eskalasi, komunikasi dan koordinasi dengan baik kepada sub unit kerja Application Support dan unit kerja Software Quality Assurance jika terdapat permasalahan atau permintaan (informasi/data) yang tidak dapat diselesaikan. 

4. Melakukan pemantauan dan menginformasikan kepada Mitra mengenai status permintaan (Informasi/data) dan keluhan sejak dilaporkan hingga terselesaikan .

5. Melakukan serah terima pekerjaan dalam setiap pergantian shift-nya, meliputi : pending issue, kapasitas storage, jumlah transaksi pending dan status Roll Out jika ada.

6. Melakukan backup data pada database server backoffice ke lokal/laptop Application Support untuk melakukan investigasi insiden .

7. Berkoordinasi dengan Mitra, terkait dengan Roll Out, kendala infrastruktur, dan penyelesaian gangguan pada produk.

Software Engineer

Unit kerja Solution Engineering bertanggung jawab untuk mengembangkan serta menyempurnakan perangkat lunak

Kualifikasi

  • Memiliki Pengalaman 1-3 Tahun.
  • Memiliki pemahaman Object Oriented Programming (OOP) Minimal dalam satu bahasa pemograman.
  • Memiliki Pengetahuan MS SQL, Postgre atau Database Lainnya.
  • Memiliki Pengetahuan tentang Restful API dan Windows Services.
  • Memiliki pengetahuan mengenai Microservices adalah nilai plus.
  • Memahami siklus SDLC.
  • Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

IT Customer Success

Unit kerja Customer Success bertanggung jawab untuk menangani dan memberikan pelayanan serta informasi atas permintaan dan keluhan tentang produk yang dihadapi oleh klien dan Mitra.

Kualifikasi untuk jabatan ini adalah:

1. Minimal D3/ S1.

2. Mengerti dan mampu menjalankan remote desktop, radmin, tcp/ip, ping, telnet, tracert.

3. Memiliki kemampuan berkomunikasi yang baik.

Responsibilities

1. Melakukan pencatatan laporan terkait permintaan (informasi/data) ataupun keluhan. Pencatatan dilakukan pada aplikasi Azure.

2. Menerima dan menangani dengan baik setiap permintaan (informasi/data) atau keluhan dari Mitra atas semua bisnis/service/produk Arranet yang disampaikan melalui media whatsapp, telepon, dan email. 

3. Melakukan eskalasi, komunikasi dan koordinasi dengan baik kepada sub unit kerja Application Support dan unit kerja Software Quality Assurance jika terdapat permasalahan atau permintaan (informasi/data) yang tidak dapat diselesaikan. 

4. Melakukan pemantauan dan menginformasikan kepada Mitra mengenai status permintaan (Informasi/data) dan keluhan sejak dilaporkan hingga terselesaikan .

5. Melakukan serah terima pekerjaan dalam setiap pergantian shift-nya, meliputi : pending issue, kapasitas storage, jumlah transaksi pending dan status Roll Out jika ada.

6. Melakukan backup data pada database server backoffice ke lokal/laptop Application Support untuk melakukan investigasi insiden .

7. Berkoordinasi dengan Mitra, terkait dengan Roll Out, kendala infrastruktur, dan penyelesaian gangguan pada produk.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

IT Customer Success

Unit kerja Customer Success bertanggung jawab untuk menangani dan memberikan pelayanan serta informasi atas permintaan dan keluhan tentang produk yang dihadapi oleh klien dan Mitra.

Kualifikasi untuk jabatan ini adalah:

  • Minimal pendidikan S1 semua jurusan,
  • Diutamakan memiliki pengalaman kerja minimal 1 tahun pada industri Financial teknologi sebagai IT helpdesk,IT support atau posisi lain yang setara / atau yang berkaitan dengan pelayanan pelanggan.
  • Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik dan rasa empati yang tinggi kepada pelanggan.
  • Memiliki pemahaman dasar software pada PC dan smartphone melingkupi : sistem operasi (windows, windows server, dan android), browser, dan konfigurasi internet Memiliki kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim dan berkolaborasi.
  • Memiliki keterampilan analisa untuk mengidentifikasi akar penyebab masalah.
  • Memiliki fleksibilitas dalam menangani situasi pelanggan yang beragamPemahaman
  • tentang troubleshoot network pada windowsfamiliar dengan web server IIS

Job Description

  • Design, develop and build scalable back-end infrastructure leveraging modern cloud platforms and technologies using Node.JS
  • Perform issue analysis, root-cause analysis, and issue resolution
  • Create any required technical documentation


Requirements

  • Strong Typescript proficiency
  • Knowledge of Node.JS and frameworks in the Node.JS ecosystem
  • Experience developing backend systems using NestJS Framework
  • Experience working with relational databases, especially PostgreSQL
  • Experience in creating unit tests using Jest, Mocha, or Jasmine.
  • Experience in using Git
  • Familiarity with Dependency Injection and/or IoC.
  • Familiarity with Docker


Preferred

  • Experience working with NoSQL databases, ex: MongoDB
  • Experience in using Cloud Service Providers such as AWS or GCP
  • Experience working with AWS Services such as Lambda, DynamoDB, SNS, SQS, SES, and S3.
  • Experience working with Redis
  • Experience in building GraphQL APIs
  • Experience building and maintaining applications/services in a Serverless environment
  • Experience working with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD)
  • Experience working with Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC)
  • Familiarity with building event-driven architecture
  • Familiarity with Event Sourcing/Event Storming
  • Familiarity with developing micro-services

Job Description

  • Design, develop and build highly scalable, cross-platform, and performant web and mobile applications using React and React-Native.
  • Perform issue analysis, root-cause analysis, and issue resolution
  • Create any required technical documentation


Requirements

  • Strong proficiency with Javascript and/ or Typescript
  • Outstanding skills in React and React Native
  • Strong understanding of user-friendly experience & interface, paying attention to details, and proficient in HTML5, SASS/ SCSS, React Native Styling, and animation.
  • Extensive knowledge of using RESTful and/ or GraphQL
  • Extensive knowledge in unit testing. 
  • Experience working with Redux and Redux SAGA
  • Experience in using Git


Preferred

  • Experience in responsive web design and PWA
  • Experience in Native Modules development with Java/ Kotlin or Swift.
  • Experience in using Gulp, Grunt, or Webpack is a plus.
  • Extensive knowledge of other programming languages like Java/ Kotlin, Swift, and C#.
  • Experience In system development using machine learning is a plus.
  • Experience in system development relevant to IoT.
  • Experience in AR/ VR development.
  • Experience in a formal development methodology - Agile/ SCRUM, Iterate, Waterfall.
  • Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/ CD) such as AppCenter, AWS CodeBuild/ CodeDeploy/ CodePipeline/ CodeCommit.
  • Familiarity with Visual Studio Code as IDE.

Job Description

  • Provision, configure and maintain infrastructure on cloud services
  • Design infrastructure architecture and implement it based on the clientâ€™s functional and non-functional requirements list.
  • Responds to incidents, and problems, and plans for growth.
  • Design and implement CI/CD pipeline.

  • Able to design microservice architecture while considering the operation, security, and availability aspect.

Job Description

  • Design & implement ML/DL solutions and integrate them with various Big Data platforms and architectures.
  • Creating and Maintain Machine Learning pipelines that are scale-able, robust, and ready for production.
  • Collaborate with domain experts, software developers, and data scientists.
  • Troubleshoot ML/DL model issues, including recommendations for retraining, re-validate, and improvements/optimization.
  • Realize Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) pipelines within ML/DL platforms. 


Requirements

  • 3 years of hands-on experience in building ML models deployed into real-world business applications or research.
  • Good understanding of Machine Learning / Deep learning frameworks such as Jupyter Notebook, Anaconda, Tensorflow, Keras, Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, MXNet, etc.
  • Experience working with cloud services platform (AWS or GCP) to build ML/DL pipelines training (GPU CUDA), evaluating (Tensorboard), deploying (SageMaker, Docker container).
  • Proficiency with Python, R, and basic libraries for machine learning such as sci-kit-learn and pandas
  • Strong working knowledge of ML/DL algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc).
  • Experience in model compression or quantization for on-edge-device inference
  • Proficiency with Open CV
  • Experience with Image Processing/Computer Vision
  • We will also factor in relevant certifications (e.g., AWS, Coursera)
  • Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery(CI/CD)

Job Description

  • Perform data exploration, data cleaning, data imputation, and feature engineering on unstructured and structured data.
  • Build the infrastructure for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) of data from a wide variety of data sources.
  • Develop and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture for training statistical and machine learning models such as regression and classification.
  • Develop and maintain evaluations to measure the effectiveness of training data. This includes measuring the capabilities of models on a variety of tasks and domains.
  • Collaborate with data scientists and machine learning engineers to develop a comprehensive data science/machine learning solution pipeline.


Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in computer science or related fields, or equivalent software engineering experience.
  • Proficiency in Python programming language
  • Experience in dataset processing and feature engineering using tools such as Numpy, Pandas, and Scikit-Learn
  • Visualization skills using tools such as Matplotlib, Seaborn, and Bokeh
  • Understanding of deep learning frameworks such as PyTorch and TensorFlow
  • Understanding of SQL and NoSQL
  • Understands Hadoop / Spark / Kafka / Hive / Presto
  • Proficiency in source control i.e. Git


Preferred

  • Deep understanding of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) concepts such as inheritance, delegation, and abstract class
  • Understanding of cloud-native technologies such as AWS, GCP, and Azure
  • Experience in using Docker
  • Experience in using AWS services such as S3, EC2, Glue, Sagemaker
  • Experience in AWS Step Function and/or AWS Lambda is even better
  • Proficiency in Scala and Java programming languages
  • Enjoy iterating quickly with research prototypes and learning new technologies

Job Description

  • Manage each projectâ€™s scope and timeline
  • Help the product owner to make the product backlogs in good shape and make them ready for the next sprint
  • Coach team on how to follow agile scrum, which really works.
  • Facilitate daily scrum, sprint planning, sprint demo, and retrospective meetings
  • Remove the impediments for the scrum team
  • Interacting with other technology teams and clients throughout the software lifecycle.


Requirements

  • Extensive knowledge of agile methodology and frameworks like Scrum, kanban, XP, etc.
  • Demonstrable experience in Scrum Management
  • Stakeholder Management, Negotiation & Communication Skills
  • Familiarity with web-based collaboration tools such as Wrike, Trello, and Confluence


Preferred

  • 3+ years of Scrum Master experience in any well-known software environment
  • Experience in mobile/ web application development

Job Description

  • Write test scripts to automate complex test cases and scenarios for mobile apps, web, and/or API.
  • Define and manage test plans, including test scenarios and test cases, that will ensure acceptance criteria are being fulfilled.
  • Execute all relevant testing types for the feature, including but not limited to UI testing, functionality testing, regression testing, smoke testing, sanity testing, and performance testing.
  • Collaborate with other engineers within a cross-functional team.


Requirements

  • Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, or related fields, or equivalent professional experience in software testing
  • Working experience in manual and automated testing for mobile/web applications and API
  • Knowledge and experience in mobile automation using Appium
  • Knowledge and experience in web automation using Playwright
  • Knowledge and experience in CI/CD pipeline automation
  • Solid understanding of SQL
  • Good perspective on how the testing process should be done
  • Having general cloud knowledge and containerization using Docker
  • Strong logical thinking
  • Strong proficiency in using Git
  • Able to work both independently within a project or as part of a team


Preferred

  • Knowledge and hands-on experience in using AWS/GCP/Azure
  • Exposure to Agile Methodology with Scrum

Job Description

  • Manage product goals maximizing the value of the Product for customers, users, and the organization
  • Communicates with stakeholders to understand objectives and actively collaborate with them during the development of a product.
  • Create and manage product backlogs.
  • Collaborate with stakeholders regarding product backlog prioritization based on scope, budget, and time constraints.
  • Collaborate with developers in product backlog refinement and all scrum events.
  • Inspect and evaluate development progress, and determine whether the product increment is acceptable and shippable.
  • Accountable for each stage of the development process and iteration.


Requirements

  • 3+ years of Product Owner experience in any well-known software environment.
  • Strong ability in describing product backlog acceptance criteria.
  • Ability to break down massive product backlog items into smaller and releasable items.
  • Extensive knowledge of agile methodology and frameworks like Scrum, kanban, XP, etc.
  • Demonstrable experience in Scrum Management.
  • Ability to present complex value propositions to other teams.
  • Good cross-team collaboration and communication skills.
  • Familiarity with web-based collaboration tools such as Wrike, Trello, ClickUp, and Confluence.


Preferred

  • Certified Scrum Product Owner.
  • Working knowledge of SaaS, cloud computing technical issues (e.g. deployment, configuration, integration, etc), authentication and authorization concepts, and technologies.

Description:

  • Design, develop, and build highly scalable, cross-platform, and performant applications using the Flutter framework.
  • Perform issue analysis, root-cause analysis, and issue resolution.
  • Create any required technical documentation.


Requirements:

  • Strong proficiency with Dart programming language
  • Outstanding skill in the Flutter framework
  • Strong understanding of user-friendly experience and interface design principles
  • Pay attention to details and be proficient in app UI/UX development using Flutter
  • Extensive knowledge of using RESTful APIs for data integration
  • Extensive knowledge in unit testing and writing testable code in Flutter
  • Experience with state management solutions like MobX, Provider, Riverpod, or equivalent in Flutter
  • Experience with version control systems, preferably Git


Preferred:

  • Experience with platform channels for integrating Flutter with native code (Java/Kotlin for Android or Swift/Objective-C for iOS)
  • Familiarity with Visual Studio Code or another IDE for Flutter development
  • Experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) processes using tools like GitLab CI, CircleCI, or Fastlane
  • Experience in publishing apps to both the App Store and Play Store
  • Experience in a formal development methodology - Agile/ SCRUM, Iterate, Waterfall

  • Proactively identify opportunities for process improvement, automation, and enhancement of Microsoft 365
  • Continuously develop solutions and collaborate closely with stakeholders to tailor solutions for business needs using Microsoft 365
  • Work with global teams to understand their requirements and to achieve the best performance utilizing Microsoft 365
  • Analyze, design, implement, and deploy solutions on the Microsoft 365 platform

Job Description:

As a Data Engineer, you will play a crucial role in the design, development, and maintenance of our data infrastructure. Your primary responsibilities will include:

  • Data Integration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather data requirements and develop ETL processes for seamless data integration.
  • Performance Optimization: Continuously monitor and enhance the performance of data warehousing solutions, ensuring scalability and efficiency.
  • Data Modeling: Design and implement data models that meet business objectives and adhere to best practices.
  • Data Governance: Implement data governance and security measures to ensure data quality and compliance with regulatory standards.
  • Documentation: Maintain clear and concise documentation of data pipelines, processes, and configurations.
  • Snowflake Expertise (if any): Utilize your deep knowledge of Snowflake to architect, build, and optimize data pipelines and warehouse solutions for our clients.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as a Data Engineer, preferred with a focus on Snowflake.
  • Strong SQL skills and proficiency, preferred in Snowflake-specific SQL syntax.
  • Experience with data modeling and data warehousing concepts.
  • Proficiency in ETL tools and techniques.
  • Knowledge of data integration and transformation processes.
  • Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or GCP.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
  • Strong communication and teamwork abilities.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Snowflake certifications is preferred.
  • Experience with data orchestration tools like Apache Airflow.
  • Knowledge of data streaming technologies (e.g., Kafka, Spark Streaming).

description:
Job Description

  • Translating usersâ€™ needs and problems into feasible solutions in the form of design deliverables (user flows, user journeys, wireframes, low-fidelity prototypes, high-fidelity prototypes, etc).
  • Work collaboratively with the product and engineering teams to deliver high usability products.
  • Plan and conduct the product design cycle from researching, defining the userâ€™s problem, ideation, prototyping, usability testing, and continuous iterations.
  • Present and justify the design concept and decisions to stakeholders by explaining the rationale and research behind it.
  • Actively involved to advocate the importance of human-centered design in digital product developments.

Requirements

  • Minimum 1 year of working experience as a UI/UX Designer.
  • A strong portfolio with demonstrable problem-solving skills is a must.
  • Good communication skills to collaborate in cross-functional teams.
  • Good problem-solving ability: able to critically analyze a problem from multiple perspectives, and generates ideas into a workable design solution.
  • Good knowledge of design fundamentals, such as design thinking frameworks, and able to take on a structured approach to solving problems.
  • Experience in conducting user research through various methods and the ability to translate research findings into tangible and actionable results.
  • Strong knowledge in User Interface and User Experience Design for the web, mobile, or touch devices.
  • Understand responsive design.
  • Experience with Figma, Adobe Products (Photoshop, XD, and Illustrator), Marvel, Zeplin, or other design tools.
  • Ability to prototype and demonstrate design concepts to extended stakeholders with inVision, Principle, or Figma.
  • Always update to the latest design trends and tools.
  • Working knowledge of common mobile and front-end web development.


Plus Point:

  • Bachelor or Degree in Computer Science or related fields.
  • Have experience in the payment industry.
  • Strong understanding of Human Psychology and Behaviour.
  • Knowledge of front-end development languages (HTML, CSS & Javascript).

company: DOKU, PT. NUSA SATU INTI ARTHA
description:
Job Description

  • Collaborate with business and product teams to understand their analytical needs, and translate them into data requirements with clearly defined data metrics and definitions.
  • Build dashboards and reports to visualize and interpret business data in supporting business decision-making.
  • Perform in-depth analysis of DOKU business, present results to varied audiences, and translate insights to actionable recommendations.
  • Understanding business objectives and developing a framework to achieve them, along with metrics to track their progress.
  • Design and develop ETL processes to ingest data into the data warehouse, and transform data into data suitable for analytics needs.
  • Defining the pre-processing or feature engineering to be done on a given dataset.
  • Analyzing the ML algorithms that could be used to solve a given problem.
  • Training and tuning their hyperparameters.
  • Evaluate the errors of production and design strategies to overcome them.
  • Deploying until its production.


Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field (i.e. Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Machine learning).
  • Minimum 3 years of experience working in the Data Science/Analytics field. Fresh graduates are welcome.
  • Proficiency with a Deep Learning Framework such as TensorFlow or Keras.
  • Proficiency with Python and basic libraries for machine learning such as sci-kit-learn and pandas.
  • Proficiency with data visualization libraries such as seaborn, matplotlib, etc.
  • Proficiency with SQL and database structure.
  • Proficiency with Probability and Statistics.
  • Proficiency with OpenCV.
  • Familiarity with at least one of the Python web frameworks (Flask, Django, etc.).
  • Familiarity with Linux.
  • Familiarity with Cloud Platforms such as Google Cloud Platform and Alicloud.
  • Familiarity with CI/CD.
  • Ability to collaborate and communicate with various stakeholders.
  • Able to demonstrate Critical Thinking.
  • Experience with time series forecasting.
  • Experience with monitoring.
  • Experience with building data marts.
  • Experience in data visualization tools - such as Google Data Studio, and Metabase - is a plus.

Zero One Technology is looking for a DevOps Engineer to join our team!

In Zero One Technology, you will work with a highly motivated team of designers, researchers and product managers to build products that make a real difference to the businesses we work with. You are expected to shape the products not only through code, but also through product development conversations and sound tradeoffs between features and technical complexity.

Responsibilities

  • Execute as an engineer with a pragmatic focus on ROI to deliver the product.
  • Think about and build a deep understanding of the productâ€™s value to the clients and users.
  • Communicate and work cross functionally with the product team.
  • Understand technical constraints, resources and opportunities, and effectively communicate ideas and concerns to the team.
  • Estimate and prioritise software requirements.


Requirements

  • Excellent problem solving skills.
  • Passion for engineering as a craftsmanship with a mindset of continuous growth and learning about everything related to technology.
  • Proficiency in Linux, Bash, Python, Docker, Gitlab CI/CD, AWS, Terraform and New Relic. (Or other scripting languages, containerisation tools, CI/CD platforms, cloud providers, infrastructure-as-code tools and monitoring tools).
  • Experience in managing infrastructure, developing CI/CD pipelines and automating developersâ€™ tasks.
  • Experience in troubleshooting and debugging web and mobile applications followed by implementing solutions.
  • Familiarity with RESTful web services using Node.js and related web frameworks such as Fastify, Express, Koa or Hapi.
  • Familiarity with SQL and NoSQL databases such as Postgres and MongoDB respectively.
  • Understanding of different deployment models for backend services, web and mobile applications.
  • Fluent in English or Indonesian.


Nice to Have

  • Good verbal communication skills.
  • Experience in working in a remote, agile team environment.
  • Experience in developing robust and maintainable infrastructure setup.
  • Experience with Nx or other build tools.
  • Deep hands-on experience in one cloud platform and its services (e.g. using GCPâ€™s GKE cluster with preemptible instances).
  • Involvement in open-source projects. Share with us your public contributions!

We Do Innovative Work That Brings a Better Life

We believe what we do every day is always embedded with innovation. At Kalbe Consumer Health, you will build your career and find your purpose. At the same time, keep innovating to provide best-in-class products for many families. We are looking for those who can bring happiness through quality health products and continuous innovation for a better life.


Position : Brand Manager


About The Role :

We are looking for a Brand Manager to participate in a develop and maintain brand image. For this role, you will collaborates with external party such as advertising agency and media to implement marketing strategy.


What You Will Do ?

  • Develop and implement marketing strategy to achieve business objective
  • Develop and maintain brand image through research and promotion activity
  • Monitor branding activity and competitor performance
  • Responsible for NPL and risk management
  • Develop suitable pricing strategy
  • Monitor and control brand's financial performance, COGS, etc.
  • Collaborates with external party such as advertising agency, media, to implement marketing strategy
  • Monitor, control and evaluate team performance


What You Will Need ?

  • Education minimum Bachelor Degree
  • Minimum 3 years experience in similar position, having experience in handle market leader brand will be preferred
  • OTC or FMCG background are welcome, having OTC background will be preferred
  • Work closely with sales team
  • Excellence skills in communication, presentation, strategic and analytical thinking
  • Willing to relocate (to Head Office, Sunter)


Benefit :

Â· Work For Anywhere policy

Â· Self Development opportunity (Training, career path)


About The Team

Kalbe Consumer Health is defined by Panca Sradha, which embraces trust, mindfulness, innovation, striving to be the best, and interconnectedness. Our people, whom we call Saka Stars, are results-oriented and customer-centered. We work in teams and quickly respond to market and consumer needs. Together, we build a better life.


About Company

Kalbe Consumer Health Division offers over-the-counter drugs with therapeutic benefits. We produce consumer products with health benefits, including supplements and other preventive products. Kalbe Consumer Health's over-the-counter portfolio categories cover more than six therapeutic classes with solid brands, commanding a dominant market share over recent decades.

Innovation is the key to Kalbe Consumer Health, and we adhere to our commitment to nourish the nation, which we always take care of jointly. We always provide health solutions ranging from digestive and skin categories, multivitamins, respiratory care, food supplements, and healthy foods.

We provide Innovative and Trustworthy products and services as a solution for daily health management. Kalbe Consumer Health is globally present around consumers. We are present in nine countries with more than sixteen OTC brands.

We ensure that all products are developed responsibly to make the lives of many people healthier globally. We believe that in the journey of Kalbe Consumer Health to provide health product solutions that can nourish the nations.

  • Create, update, and maintain all Test documentation

Work onsite for 3 days at the client's office located in Sunter, North Jakarta during the project.


Job Description :

  • Coordinate people and processes to deliver projects on time, within budget and with the desired outcomes aligned to objectives
  • Define project objectives, project scope, roles & responsibilities
  • Prepare a detailed project plan to schedule key project milestones, workstreams & activities
  • Track project and providing regular reports on project status to project team and key stakeholders
  • As a Scrum Master who responsible for ensuring the team implements agile practices and values in a disciplined manner, such as daily stand ups, retrospectives and others

  • Plan and execute disciplined scrum activities such as daily sprint planning, sprint review and sprint release.

  • Proficient and understanding of the use of Agile and Scrum.
  • Understanding of the software development life cycle, Data Flow Diagrams, Entity Relationship diagrams
  • Solid Computer Science fundamentals, and excellent problem-solving skills.

Responsibilities

We are seeking an exceptional Trainer & Writer to join our team and make a lasting impact on our learners. You will be responsible for:

  1. Develop engaging and informative training materials, including curriculum, presentations, manuals, and online resources.
  2. Deliver training sessions and workshops, both in-person and virtually, to educate and empower participants.
  3. Create compelling written content, such as articles, blog posts, instructional materials, and marketing collateral.
  4. Conduct research to stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and emerging topics.
  5. Collaborate with subject matter experts and stakeholders to ensure accuracy and relevancy of training and written materials.
  6. Customize training programs to meet the specific needs of different audiences and learning objectives.
  7. Evaluate the effectiveness of training programs and materials, making improvements based on feedback and performance metrics.
  8. Provide guidance and support to learners, answering questions and addressing concerns throughout the training process.
  9. Run and execute company training schedule to all employee
  10. As company representative for business needed


Requirement

  1. Bachelor's degree in english language,english literature or a related field
  2. Strong writing and speaking in english for writing skills, with the ability to create compelling and engaging content.
  3. Excellent verbal communication and presentation skills, with the ability to deliver training sessions in a clear and engaging manner.
  4. Experience in curriculum development, or training program creation.
  5. Knowledge of adult learning principles and instructional methodologies.
  6. Ability to adapt training techniques to accommodate diverse learning styles and audience needs.
  7. Strong research skills to gather and analyze information from various sources.
  8. Attention to detail, ensuring accuracy and consistency in training materials and written content.
  9. Strong organizational and time management skills to handle multiple projects and deadlines.
  10. Passion for learning, growth, and helping others reach their full potential.

  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  • Strong problem-solving and critical-thinking abilities.


RESPONSIBILITIES :

  • Research to understand user behavior, needs, and preferences. This includes creating user personas and conducting surveys, interviews, and usability testing.
  • Develop wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize user flows and design concepts. Test and iterate on prototypes to improve user interactions.
  • Create visually appealing user interfaces, including layouts, color schemes, typography, and iconography. Ensure that the designs align with the company's branding guidelines.
  • Plan and conduct usability testing to gather feedback and identify areas for improvement. Incorporate user feedback into design iterations.
  • Design for a variety of screen sizes and devices, ensuring a consistent and user-friendly experience across different platforms (e.g., desktop, mobile, tablet).
  • Create information architecture and navigation structures that enhance the user's ability to find and access information efficiently.
  • Create design specifications, style guides, and documentation to facilitate the development and maintenance of digital products. Ensure that the development team has a clear understanding of design requirements.
  • Monitor user behavior and gather metrics to assess the effectiveness of the designs. Make data-driven decisions to enhance the user experience.
  • Present design concepts and findings to stakeholders, explaining the rationale behind design decisions and user-focused strategies.

Job Description

  1. Designing, coding, and modifying websites from layout to function
  2. Create visually appealing sites that feature user-friendly design and clear navigation
  3. Planning and prototyping new applications
  4. Designing the architecture of the components of an application
  5. Learning and testing new technologies, frameworks and languages


Requirement

  1. Bachelor's degree majoring in Information Technology/Software Engineering
  2. Have min 2 years experience in the area of programming and system development
  3. Strong understanding of UI, cross browser compatibility, general web functions and standards
  4. Deep expertise and experience with Web Applications and programming languages such as Vue.Js and Nuxt.Js
  5. Experience integration with RESTApi
  6. Experience using libraries: Redux, sagas, hooks, axios
  7. Have Web programming skill, Web User Interface Design, and E-commerce applications is advantage
  8. Knowledge in version control tools (git) is plus

Job Description

  1. Planning, organizing, and overseeing process or production trials
  2. Making improvements for website/application
  3. Formulating new production process & monitoring timeline
  4. Recording and analysing data
  5. Assist in the planning, design, and development of test requirements and any special testing software to establish product
  6. Testing of prototypes accordingly to verify product reliability and performance requirements


Requirement

  1. Ability to communicate with developers/software engineer, other coworkers/department
  2. Good in communication skill, can-do attitude
  3. Demonstrated success defining and launching excellent products
  4. Strong knowledge of technology, user experience, design
  5. Strong knowledge of business strategy to understand how the product fits into overall direction & vision of the company or organization
  6. Ability to ensure the product have a good return on investment, while at the same time optimizing its quality
  7. Have experience as Product Manager/Product Owner at least 1-2 year experience preferably technical background

The Job

We are looking for a data analyst to help our client make smart, data-driven business decisions. As a Data Analyst, you'll be responsible to help build and ensure the data solutions are optimized for speed, reliability, and accuracy. You'll work with cross-functional teams to identify data requirements and develop innovative solutions to address their needs.


Responsibilities

  • Understand the day-to-day issues that our business faces, which can be better understood with data
  • Gathering data through various sources and analytics tools
  • Maintain data quality and accuracy by regularly auditing data and implementing necessary improvements
  • Generating and communicating clear, compelling and actionable insights
  • Maintaining dashboards and reports
  • Ensuring that client facing and internal reporting is done in a timely manner
  • Analyze large datasets and uncover trends, patterns, and insights that can inform decision-making
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams and stakeholders to implement data-driven solutions
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, new technologies, and best practices related to Data Analysis/analytics


Requirements

  • Minimum 1 years of experience in data analytics
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills in English, both verbally and in writing, at a professional level
  • Strong skills in SQL or any database management, Microsoft Excel (advance level), Python, and/or R programming
  • Familiarity with BI Tools such as: Looker, Looker Studio, Tableau, PowerBI, or Mode
  • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Ability to work with cross-functional teams and stakeholders
  • Attention to detail and ability to work with large, complex datasets
  • Fresh Graduate are welcome to apply


Good to Have

  • Experience in A / B testing and correlation analysis.
  • Experience with cloud-based data platforms, such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform.
  • Experience in product analytics using one of these tools : Appsflyer, Clevertap, Amplitude, SnowPlow, Mixpanel or Google Analytics.
  • Experience in designing and building data warehouses, data pipelines, and ETL processes.
  • Familiar with version control

The Job


As a Junior Full Stack JavaScript Developer, you will be responsible for assisting in the development, implementation, and maintenance of web applications. You will work closely with senior developers and cross-functional teams to create efficient and scalable software solutions. This is an excellent opportunity to gain hands-on experience and grow your skills in full stack JavaScript development, with a focus on Next.js and GraphQL.


Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, test, and deploy web applications using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Next.js, and GraphQL.
  • Assist in building and maintaining the front-end and back-end components of web applications, ensuring high performance, responsiveness, and usability.
  • Participate in code reviews and debugging sessions to identify and fix issues, ensuring the overall quality of the software.
  • Help integrate user interface (UI) designs with server-side functionality using Next.js, ensuring seamless user experiences.
  • Contribute to the development of GraphQL APIs and backend services, interacting with databases and external APIs to retrieve and store data.
  • Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand project requirements and deliver software solutions that meet business needs.
  • Stay up to date with the latest trends and best practices in web development, specifically in Next.js and GraphQL, and suggest improvements to enhance development processes and technologies used.
  • Assist in maintaining and enhancing existing web applications, addressing bugs, and implementing new features as required.
  • Document code, processes, and workflows to ensure the effective transfer of knowledge within the team.


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field (or equivalent practical experience).
  • 1+ years of experience in web development using JavaScript and related technologies
  • Solid understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, with hands-on experience in building web applications.
  • Proficiency in at least one front-end framework/library, such as React, Angular, or Vue.js.
  • Familiarity with Next.js framework for server-side rendering and building React applications.
  • Basic understanding of back-end development using Node.js or other server-side frameworks.
  • Experience with GraphQL and its concepts, including schema definition, resolvers, and queries/mutations.
  • Experience with databases (e.g., SQL, MongoDB) and knowledge of data modeling and querying.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies.
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with an ability to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies.
  • Good communication skills and ability to work effectively both independently and in a team environment.
  • Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality code.
  • Fresh Graduates are welcome


Good to have:

  • Knowledge of serverless architecture and deployment using platforms like AWS Lambda or Firebase Functions.
  • Familiarity with testing frameworks and methodologies (e.g., Jest, Mocha, Selenium).
  • Understanding of containerization technologies like Docker and container orchestration with Kubernetes.
  • Knowledge of DevOps practices and tools for continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD).
  • Experience with performance optimization and profiling of web applications.
  • Understanding of responsive design principles and mobile-first development.
  • Knowledge of TypeScript or other statically typed languages.
  • Familiarity with UI/UX design principles and collaboration with design teams.
