As a Senior Frontend Engineer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing user interfaces for web applications. You will work closely with the UX/UI designers, back-end developers, and other stakeholders to ensure the best possible user experience. You will also be responsible for leading and mentoring junior developers, providing technical guidance and ensuring the quality of their work.


Responsibilities:

  • Design and develop user interfaces for web applications using web frameworks such as React, Vue.js, or Angular
  • Collaborate with UX/UI designers, back-end developers, and other stakeholders to ensure the best possible user experience
  • Develop and maintain front-end architectures and design patterns
  • Lead and mentor junior developers, providing technical guidance and ensuring the quality of their work
  • Participate in code reviews, ensuring the code quality and adherence to best practices
  • Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in web development
  • Troubleshoot and debug issues, ensuring the smooth operation of the applications
  • Communicate and collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams


Requirements:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related field
  • Minmimum 1 years of experience in front-end development, with a strong focus on web development
  • Proficiency in web frameworks such as React, Vue.js, or Angular, as well as TypeScript
  • Excellent knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Familiarity with cross-browser compatibility issues and how to address them
  • Strong understanding of web design principles, UX/UI design, and best practices
  • Experience with agile development methodologies
  • Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills
  • Ability to work independently and in a team environment
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
  • Fresh Graduates are welcome to apply

  • Experience with server-side rendering and/or progressive web apps
  • Familiarity with state management libraries such as Redux or MobX
  • Experience with testing frameworks such as Jest or Cypress
  • Understanding of performance optimization techniques, such as lazy loading and code splitting
  • Experience with version control systems, such as Git
  • Knowledge of continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) pipelines
  • Familiarity with serverless architecture and cloud platforms, such as AWS or Azure
  • Ability to mentor and train other developers on best practices and emerging technologies

The Job


We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Backend Node.js Developer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate should be passionate about developing high-quality, scalable, and maintainable software solutions. As a Senior Backend Node.js Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining server-side applications, databases, and APIs. You will work closely with cross-functional teams, including front-end developers, designers, and product managers, to deliver exceptional software solutions.


Responsibilities

  • Design, develop, and maintain scalable and robust server-side applications using Node.js and related frameworks
  • Develop and maintain APIs that power front-end applications and mobile apps
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of front-end and back-end systems
  • Optimize server-side applications for maximum speed and scalability
  • Write unit tests and conduct code reviews to ensure high-quality and maintainable code
  • Troubleshoot and debug issues across the stack, including the database, server, and APIs
  • Ensure code quality, performance, and security standards are met
  • Keep up-to-date with emerging trends and technologies in the backend development space
  • Mentor and coach junior developers to ensure continuous learning and growth


Qualifications

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • Minimum 1 years of experience in backend development using Node.js and related technologies
  • Strong understanding of server-side programming languages such as JavaScript, TypeScript, and Node.js
  • Familiarity with Node.js frameworks such as Express, Koa, or Nest.js
  • Experience with database technologies such as MySQL, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL
  • Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud
  • Proficient in building RESTful APIs
  • Strong understanding of Git and code versioning tools
  • Experience with Agile/Scrum methodologies
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills

  • Fresh Graduates are welcome to apply

  • Familiarity with GraphQL
  • Experience with DevOps practices such as Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment
  • Understanding of microservices architecture
  • Contributions to open-source projects in the Node.js ecosystem

The world is in the midst of an accelerated transition towards a digital-first future where every company is becoming a tech company. The resulting outcome is that the demand for developers is now at its highest ever and the number of people learning programming skills is accelerating rapidly. In fact, Microsoft estimates the number of coders to be at 200 million by 2025 - 4X what it is today!

Generalised and large internet platforms canâ€™t be everything to everyone. There is no community and features can never be built with focus around developers. We believe in community-based platforms and want to build for that.


Elite

Weâ€™re glad you have interest in joining our Elite Collective. The Elite Collective is a community comprised of senior and experienced developers. Being a member gives you access to our private communities, in-person events, and most importantly jobs and projects curated for Elite.

Showwcase works with many partner companies to help build their developer teams to work on projects. As an Elite, youâ€™ll get access to these full-time job opportunities with better compensation and career growth. We do all the hard work of finding you opportunities so you can focus on what you do best, building products and services. If at any time your project nears completion or your role at a given company is no longer needed, we find you the opportunity within weeks!


How does it work


First, youâ€™ll need to create a Showwcase profile. Once youâ€™re set up, apply to one of our Elite roles according to your skill: React, Flutter, Go etc. We review and if youâ€™re a good fit for Elite, weâ€™ll invite you to come call with us, do a few skill assessments, and some live interviews. This should take a few hours at max! Once done and successful, you join our Elite collective and get all its benefits.


Why join Elite?


We believe the traditional way of looking for jobs is broken. Developers have to complete skill assessments over and over again for every company we apply to, we need to submit at least 5 links to represent who we are (LinkedIn, Resume, Github, Blog, Portfolio), and companies are terrible at responding to developers even after weâ€™ve completed all the steps. Worse, most of the time the interview process has nothing to do with what weâ€™ll actually be doing on the job! Itâ€™s incredibly frustrating. Oh, and doing sales and marketing of who we are to find the right company to hire us is not fun.

As an Elite Collective Member, we do all the heavy lifting for you. We find great opportunities, negotiate salary, and handle contracts with different leading companies and startups around the world and offer them to you to work on. These jobs are full-time roles and youâ€™ll get to work with the modern processes with good pay.


Job Description


We are seeking a highly experienced Senior Full Stack JavaScript Developer to join our team. As a Senior Full Stack JavaScript Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing complex web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.js, and TypeScript. You will work on both the front-end and back-end of the applications, ensuring that they are scalable, secure, and performant. You will also collaborate with other developers, product managers, and designers to ensure that our products meet the needs of our customers.


Responsibilities


  • Design and develop complex web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks and TypeScript
  • Develop and maintain server-side APIs using Node.js or similar technologies
  • Write clean, maintainable, and scalable code
  • Work with databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
  • Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other developers to ensure that our products meet the needs of our customers
  • Ensure that the applications are secure, scalable, and performant
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in web development
  • Mentor and train junior developers


Requirements


  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field
  • 3+ years of experience in full-stack JavaScript development
  • Strong experience with at least one modern JavaScript framework such as React, Angular, or Vue.js
  • Experience with TypeScript and server-side JavaScript technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, or similar
  • Strong experience with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
  • Experience with databases such as MongoDB, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
  • Knowledge of software design patterns and best practices
  • Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills
  • Experience with Git and Agile software development methodologies


Good to have


  • Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud Platform
  • Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes
  • Experience with testing frameworks such as Jest or Mocha
  • Familiarity with front-end performance optimization techniques
  • Experience with GraphQL or other API technologies
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and automation tools


If you are a highly experienced Full Stack JavaScript Developer who is passionate about developing complex web applications using modern technologies, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

We are looking for software engineers to design, develop, enhance, optimize and maintain software products/platforms. You will use modern technology like Node, TypeScript, Angular, React, Cloud-computing, PWA, etc. to build secure, robust, and scalable applications. You could also leverage low code or no code technologies in order to develop your projects. You will work alongside other great software engineers, product/platform managers, and UI/UX designers. In this role, you should have a good analytical thinking and problem solving skills as well as good understanding of various programming paradigms.


Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, test, maintain, rewrite, refactor, scale, deploy new/existing software products.
  • Produce high quality, clean and efficient code on time.
  • Troubleshoot, debug, and upgrade existing software.
  • Verify and deploy programs and systems.
  • Integrate software components and third-party programs.


Requirements

  • Passion in problem-solving, software engineering, and/or application development.
  • Excellent understanding of algorithms, programming paradigms (procedural, object-oriented, functional, reactive, etc.), and architectural skills.
  • Experience with cloud computing, distributed systems, and microservices architecture will be a plus.
  • Willingness to constantly learn new technologies and apply those concepts.
  • Resourcefulness, and troubleshooting aptitude.
  • High initiative, strong analytical skills, and high attention to detail.
  • Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment or a startup.
  • Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Informatics Engineering or a related field.
  • Strong interpersonal and communication skills.

Responsibilities

  • Managing the entire product life cycle from strategic planning to tactical activities.
  • Specifying market requirements for current and future products by conducting market research supported by on-going visits to customers and non-customers.
  • Driving a solution set across development teams (primarily Development/Engineering) through market requirements, product contract, and positioning.
  • Developing and implementing a company-wide go-to-market plan, working with all departments to execute.
  • Analyzing potential partner relationships for the product.


Requirements

  • BA/BS in Computer Science or a related technical field or equivalent.
  • Ability to quickly learn.
  • Excellent communications/customer interfacing skill and the ability to deal with ambiguity and prioritize issues.


"Preferred Qualifications"

  • BS and BA or MBA
  • Ability to cost, schedule, and execute across multiple feature teams to ship quality software on time.
  • Skills to attract and grow top talents as well as network effectively across groups and companies.
  • Knowledgeable in latest technology (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, PHP, Java, database, Unit Testing, Automated Testing, Continuous Integration, etc.

Axiata Digital Labs is the technology hub of Axiata Group Berhad Malaysia which is one of the leading groups in telecommunication in Asia. We provide innovative software services, offering telco-focused digital and IT services and solutions that enable individuals, startups and enterprises.


Responsibilities:

  • Contribute to different stages of SDLC process when necessity arise.
  • Report incidents in Jira and Asana with a potential fault analysis.
  • System performance measuring and monitoring.
  • Assist L1/L2 team in technical incident management.
  • System troubleshooting Level 1 and probing incident.
  • Participating in System Integration Testing.
  • Conduct DevSecOps practices.
  • Technical documentation.
  • Follow Agile process.


Qualifications:

  • Engineering degree in Telecommunication, Computer science, IT, Systems/Networking or related fields.
  • 1-2 years of experience as DevOps Engineer.
  • Excellent teamworking and English communication skills.
  • Basic understanding of systems/networking/software fundamentals and concepts.
  • Strong problem-solving skills.
  • Basic understanding of CICD, DevOps, DevSecOps activities and concepts.
  • Familiarity with UNIX based OS.
  • Familiar with scripting (Bash/Ansible/Python/Terraform), Java/Angular/React/PHP coding languages would be an advantage.
  • Familiar with CICD tooling (Jenkins, SonarQube, Kubernetes, Docker, SCM tools).
  • Familiarity Monitoring and log management related tools (Prometheus, Grafana).
  • Familiarity with one or multiple cloud platforms.
  • Basic understanding of system and network security (DevSecOps).
  • Basic understanding on scrum and agile practices.
  • DevOps related professional certifications will be an added advantage.
  • Understanding of an IT service management system (Jira, ZenDesk).
  • Strong reporting and documenting skills.
  • Understanding of IT Service Management methodologies (ITIL/BISL/Cobit).
  • Have a strong ability to document procedures, results, reports, etc.


Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.

Job Description

  1. Full ownership of scoping, planning and running white and grey box penetration tests against identified systems, using professional penetration testing tools
  2. Provides periodic penetration testing and professional analysis of Mobile App and APIs in Microservices Environment
  3. Assist to design log aggregation pattern and criteria using ELK or Splunk Core, for easier threat findings
  4. Liaising with Security Operation Center Team (SoC) in monitoring Threats
  5. Analyze and triage information security incident using our existing Service Level management flow
  6. Escalate high priority information security incident to supervisor.
  7. Research on recent information security trends - using threat intel or other appropriate tools/scanner
  8. Conduct scheduled Vulnerability Management


Requirements

  • Bachelor degree in Information Technology/Computer Science/Information System with 2 years of professional work experience as a Ethical Hacker or Professional Penetration Tester
  • Having at least 2 years of experience as Information Security or IT Governance or IT Auditors
  • Having an excellent knowledge of ISO27001

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

Kami perusahaan media yang sedang berkembang mencari content creator yang berbakat dan bersemangat untuk bergabung dengan tim kami. Kami menggunakan sistem pay-per-performance yang memungkinkan Anda untuk mendapatkan imbalan berdasarkan kinerja dan hasil yang Anda capai. Kami menawarkan kesempatan untuk berkembang dan meningkatkan penghasilan Anda melalui konten yang menarik dan berpengaruh.

Responsibilities

  • Membuat konten yang berkualitas dan menarik, terutama dalam bentuk artikel untuk situs web kami.
  • Menerapkan strategi SEO yang efektif untuk meningkatkan visibilitas dan peringkat konten.
  • Menghasilkan konten yang sesuai dengan target audiens dan memenuhi tujuan bisnis kami.
  • Mengelola kalender editorial dan mematuhi tenggat waktu yang ditentukan.
  • Melakukan riset topik dan sumber daya yang relevan untuk konten yang akurat dan informatif.
  • Membangun jaringan dan kolaborasi dengan mitra eksternal, jika diperlukan.


Kualifikasi:

  • Keahlian dalam menulis artikel dengan bahasa yang jelas, persuasif, dan menarik.
  • Pemahaman yang baik tentang strategi SEO dan kemampuan untuk menerapkannya dalam konten.
  • Pengetahuan atau minat dalam topik yang relevan dengan industri atau niche kami.
  • Pengalaman sebelumnya dalam penulisan artikel, baik secara profesional maupun sebagai kontributor lepas.
  • Kemampuan untuk bekerja dengan tenggat waktu yang ketat dan menghasilkan konten berkualitas tinggi dalam waktu yang efisien.


Metrik dan Indikator Kinerja:

  • Mencapai target minimum 10.000 tayangan per artikel dalam sebulan.
  • Meningkatkan peringkat konten dalam hasil pencarian dengan kata kunci yang ditentukan.
  • Mencapai tingkat konversi minimal 5% untuk tindakan yang diinginkan dalam konten.
  • Memperoleh setidaknya 100 interaksi sosial (like, share, komentar) dalam sebulan.


Model Pembayaran:

  • Pembayaran akan dilakukan berdasarkan kinerja dan hasil yang dicapai.
  • Setiap tayangan, konversi, atau interaksi sosial akan dihargai sesuai dengan persentase yang telah disepakati.
  • Evaluasi dan pembayaran akan dilakukan setiap bulan berdasarkan kinerja konten Anda.

Pengaturan dan Dukungan:

  • Anda akan diberikan akses ke platform CMS kami untuk mengelola dan mempublikasikan konten.
  • Anda juga akan diberikan akses ke alat analitik yang kami gunakan untuk melihat kinerja konten Anda.
  • Tim kami akan memberikan panduan dan dukungan yang diperlukan untuk membantu Anda mencapai target dan meningkatkan kualitas konten Anda.


Pengembangan dan Pertumbuhan:

  • Kesuksesan Anda dalam mencapai target dan menghasilkan konten yang menarik akan membuka peluang kerja yang lebih baik dan pengakuan dalam industri.
  • Kami berkomitmen untuk membantu Anda berkembang dalam peran content creator dan memberikan kesempatan untuk menghadiri pelatihan dan seminar terkait.


Kontrak dan Kesepakatan:

  • Setelah diterima, kami akan menyusun kontrak atau kesepakatan tertulis yang mencakup semua persyaratan, kondisi, dan ketentuan pembayaran pay-per-performance.
  • Kontrak juga akan mencakup perlindungan kekayaan intelektual dan hak cipta terkait konten yang Anda hasilkan.

Job Description

  • Menafsirkan data, menganalisis hasil menggunakan teknik statistik dan memberikan laporan yang sedang berlangsung.
  • Mengembangkan dan mengimplementasikan database, sistem pengumpulan data, analisis data dan strategi lain yang mengoptimalkan efisiensi dan kualitas Statistik.
  • Memperoleh data dari sumber data primer atau sekunder dan memelihara database/data sistem.
  • Mengidentifikasi, menganalisa, dan menafsirkan tren atau pola dalam kumpulan data yang kompleks

Job Specification

  • Pendidikan minimal S1 jurusan matematika, teknik (listrik/elektronik), teknik (komputer/telekomunikasi), teknik (mekanik), dan ilmu komputer/teknologi informasi dengan IPK Minimum 3,00.
  • Keterampilan analitis yang baik dan pemecahan masalah yang inovatif.
  • Proaktif, rinci, hasil berorientasi dan berkomitmen untuk menyelesaikan tugas.
  • Mahir dalam mengoperasikan Microsoft Office.
  • Familiar dengan database.
  • Terbuka untuk lulusan baru.

MDP is a program established exclusively to recruit and develop young graduates to become our leaders of tomorrow. Therefore, we are passionate about having people who can grow and develop professionally in terms of skills and character. Through our diversified and aggressively expanding businesses, we encourage our people to excel in their performance and thus constantly grow in their careers.

Responsibilities

  • Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply
  • Bachelor or Master degree in Finance or Accounting
  • Graduates from reputable universities are preferred
  • Minimum 3.0 GPA on a 4.0 scale or equivalent
  • Active in the organization, community, or sports
  • Must have a positive mindset and attitude, discipline, and integrity
  • Must be individuals who are ambitious, goal-getters, results-driven, and resilient

Job Role:

Responsible for selling product to customers in accordance with the target given. 

 

Job Description:

  • Provide knowledge for customers related to products, prices, availability, process buying
  • Prepare and attend any exhibition
  • Establishing contract and developing relationship with existing customer and/or potential customer
  • Resolve customer complaints regarding sales and service
  • Prepare updated sales report to maintain sales performance.


 Job Requirements:

  • Candidate must possess at least Diploma degree from any field
  • At least 1 year of working experience in Sales Property
  • Preferable having experience in property industry, insurance, or automotive
  • Good communication, presentation and negotiation skills
  • Willing to be placed in Karawaci and Bintaro.

We're looking for someone who has experience focusing on Highrise buildings and Residential developments.


Job Requirements:

  • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor's Degree, Master's Degree/Post Graduate Degree in Engineering (Civil) or equivalent.
  • At least 8 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Knowledge of design standards and construction methods of civil engineering projects, especially infrastructure.
  • Knowledge about CAD design and project management programs.    
  • Working location: Karawaci.


Job Description:

  • Oversee the implementation of the master plan especially infrastructure
  • Approve the design concept as well as DED ( Detail Engineering Design ) to fit the development goals.
  • Ensure and supervises the implementation of infrastructure construction.
  • Coordinate with related parties in the construction process (Infrastructure)
  • Decide on work methods and allocation of contractor resources to ensure the project runs on time with good quality.

Job Role:

Verifying, allocating, posting and reconciling accounts payable and receivable. Producing error-free accounting reports and present their results. Analyzing financial information and summarizing financial status.

 Job Responsibilities:

  • Preparing the daily operations of the finance accounting department 
  • Monitoring and analyzing accounting data and produce financial reports or statement
  • Establishing and enforcing proper accounting methods, policies and principles


Job Requirements:

  • Candidate must possess at least Bachelor/Master Degree in Accounting from reputable university with minimum GPA 3.00
  • At least 3 years of working experience in the related field is required for this position
  • Coming from Public Accounting firm will be advantage
  • Have a good understanding of Accounting & Financing Flow
  • Working location: Karawaci

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

Application Developermengembangkan aplikasi berbasis web atau mobileApplication Developerjuga berperan dalam melakukan pengetesan sistem aplikasi, melakukan dokumentasi  dan , serta melakukan   dalam aplikasi.

Application Developerdi IT BCA, yaitu:

  1. IT Staff. Karyawan akan melalui masa probation selama 3 bulan dan akan mendapatkan pembekalan teknis, buddy, dan mentor dari IT BCA. Jalur ini terbuka untuk Entry Level dan Experienced Professional.
  2. Karyawan PKWT (Perjanjian Kerja Waktu Tertentu). Karyawan PKWT akan menjalani masa kontrak selama 1 tahun dengan mendapatkan pembekalan teknis, pelatihan soft skill, buddy, dan mentor. Setelah menyelesaikan masa kontrak, karyawan PKWT berkesempatan diangkat menjadi karyawan tetap IT BCA. Jalur ini terbuka untuk Entry Level 


Kualifikasi

  • Minimal lulusan S1 yang berkaitan dengan Teknik Informatika dan Sistem Informasi
  • IPK minimal 2.75
  • Usia maksimal 27 tahun
  • Memiliki pengalaman dalam pengembangan aplikasi berbasis mobile (Android/iOS) web
  • Menguasai minimal 1 bahasa pemrograman (lebih disukai apabila menguasai Java), serta memiliki pengalaman dalam menggunakan framework Java seperti Spring dan framework JavaScript seperti ReactJS, NodeJS, Angular, dan Vue. Pernah mempelajari bahasa pemrograman .Net
  • Memiliki pengalaman menggunakan database seperti SQL dan Oracle
  • Bersedia ditempatkan di Jakarta / Tangerang / Yogyakarta

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

Untuk mempersiapkan tenaga profesional di bidang IT, BCA secara spesifik merancang program BDP IT. Peserta BDP IT akan mengikuti pelatihan selama 12 bulan di BCA mengenai perbankan dan . Lulusan program ini akan diangkat langsung menjadi karyawan tetap dan ditempatkan di Divisi IT BCA. Selama pelatihan, peserta akan mendapatkan uang saku bulanan, jaminan kesehatan, tunjangan hari raya, tunjangan akhir tahun dan tentunya pelatihan yang berkualitas dari BCA.

Job Descriptions:

  • Development Mobile Front End Application
  • Cooperate solidly and effectively with all team members for the achievement of software development projects
  • Searching for the best solution and fixing a problem related to system applications/software
  • Perform maintenance, development, and monitoring of systems/software used in the company's business


Requirements:

  • D3 or Bachelor Degree in Information Technology
  • Having 1 year experience in related field
  • Excellent knowledge in Java & Kotlin
  • Have a good knowledge Jetpack Compose is a plus
  • Excellent knowledge in API concept & Json
  • Excellent knowledge in Room Database
  • Strong understanding in Firebase
  • Have an experience in Accessing GPS Location and Google Maps
  • Have an experience in Background and Foreground Service is a plus

sector: Konsultan Solusi Digital & Teknologi Informasi (Web & Apps Developer)
description:
Tanggung Jawab :

  • Memeriksa dan memverifikasi dokumen terkait transaksi keuangan klien.
  • Memasukkan data keuangan ke dalam sistem yang dimiliki perusahaan.
  • Melatih dan memberikan edukasi kepada klien tentang penggunaan aplikasi terkait.
  • Membuat dan menjaga hubungan baik dengan klien.


Persyaratan :

  • Kandidat minimal harus memiliki lulusan D3 Akuntansi (berpengalaman).
  • Lulusan S1 Manajemen Keuangan / Akuntansi / Akuntansi Syariah (Fresh Graduate) dengan pemahaman yang baik tentang akuntansi.
  • Pengalaman dalam Akuntansi Koperasi akan diprioritaskan.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki kemampuan membuat laporan Laba / Rugi (L / R), jurnal, neraca, dll.
  • Mampu bekerja dalam tim maupun secara individu.
  • Mampu bekerja di bawah tekanan.

sector: Konsultan Solusi Digital & Teknologi Informasi (Web & Apps Developer)
description:
Tanggung Jawab:

  • Membangun website/aplikasi berbasis web menggunakan PHP, Laravel/CI, atau framework PHP lainnya.
  • Membantu pengembangan proyek kami yang sedang berjalan/ada.
  • Memberikan umpan balik teknis.

 

Persyaratan:

  • Berpengalaman dalam pemrograman PHP dengan menggunakan salah satu framework.Berpengalaman dengan salah satu CI, Laravel, atau framework PHP lainnya.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki pengetahuan tentang Pemrograman Berorientasi Objek dan pengembangan aplikasi web.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki pengetahuan dasar tentang SQL.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki pengetahuan tentang HTML5/CSS3 dan JavaScript.
  • Berpengalaman dengan Version Control (GIT).
  • Kemampuan komunikasi dan analisis yang baik.
  • Antusias untuk belajar hal-hal baru.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki kepribadian yang baik.

sector: Konsultan Solusi Digital & Teknologi Informasi (Web & Apps Developer)
description:
Tanggung Jawab:

  • Kandidat harus memiliki kemampuan untuk menerjemahkan dan membuat storyboard dari desain mock-up ke dalam kode.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki kemampuan untuk mengevaluasi dan mengintegrasikan API dan SDK pihak ketiga.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki kemampuan untuk melakukan pengujian beta melalui test flight.
  • Harus memiliki kemampuan untuk merancang, membangun, dan mengintegrasikan REST API yang terukur.


Persyaratan:

  • Harus memiliki pengetahuan tentang Pemrograman Berorientasi Objek dan pengembangan aplikasi mobile.
  • Berpengalaman dengan Java dan XML.
  • Berpengalaman dengan HTML, CSS3, dan NodeJS.
  • Harus memiliki pengetahuan tentang pengembangan Android dengan Java murni atau Kotlin.
  • Harus memiliki pengetahuan tentang pengembangan Android hybrid dengan Flutter.
  • Berpengalaman dengan Version Control (GIT).
  • Kandidat harus memiliki kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim.
  • Antusias untuk belajar hal-hal baru.
  • Kandidat harus memiliki kepribadian yang baik.

Requirements :

  • D3/S1 degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
  • Good algorithm
  • Have at least experiences/knowledge of:
  • Javascript or Typescript or Python
  • Any Frontend frameworks (React or Vue or Solid etc)
  • RDBMS (PostgreSQL or MySQL/MariaDB)
  • Able to work under pressure, fast learner, critical thinker, independent, multi - tasking, and good in communications and interpersonal skills.

  • Lulusan S1 di bidang MIPA atau sederajat
  • Menguasai bidang MIPA hingga SMA
  • Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi dan koordinasi yang baik

As an IT Teacher for K-12 students, you will be responsible for designing and delivering engaging and educational IT lessons specifically catered to children. Your focus will be on introducing young learners to the world of technology, coding, and digital literacy. 

Responsibilities:

  • Stay updated on the latest educational technologies and incorporate them into the curriculum.
  • Foster a positive and inclusive learning environment where students feel encouraged to explore and experiment with technology.
  • Supervise and guide students as they explore and interact with different digital platforms.
  • Provide constructive feedback to both students and parents/guardians.
  • Mark examinations during test periods.
  • Conduct workshops or extracurricular activities to further enrich students' knowledge of technology and IT-related subjects.

Javascript or Typescript or Python

  • Any Frontend frameworks (React or Vue or Solid etc)
  • RDBMS (PostgreSQL or MySQL/MariaDB)
    • Able to work under pressure, fast learner, critical thinker, independent, multi - tasking, and good in communications and interpersonal skills.

Kami sedang mencari Web Developer (Shopify Expert) yang berbakat dan berpengalaman untuk bergabung dengan tim kami. Kandidat yang berhasil di posisi ini akan bertanggung jawab untuk mengelola dan memelihara toko Shopify kami, memastikan fungsinya yang optimal, dan memberikan pengalaman belanja online yang luar biasa bagi pelanggan kami.

 

Lingkup tanggung jawab:

- Merancang, mengembangkan, dan memelihara situs web, tema, dan aplikasi Shopify

- Sesuaikan tema Shopify untuk memenuhi kebutuhan klien, memastikan pengalaman dan kinerja pengguna yang optimal

- Menerapkan fitur, fungsionalitas, dan integrasi Shopify yang baru

- Mengembangkan dan mengelola aplikasi, widget, dan plugin Shopify

- Mengoptimalkan kinerja dan fungsionalitas situs web untuk memastikan pengalaman pengguna yang lancar dan mulus.

- Memantau lalu lintas situs dan analitik kinerja untuk mengidentifikasi area yang perlu ditingkatkan dan menerapkan solusi yang efektif.

- Berkolaborasi dengan klien untuk memahami tujuan bisnis mereka dan memberikan rekomendasi tentang cara meningkatkan situs web Shopify dan keberadaan online mereka

- Tetap up-to-date dengan tren, pembaruan, dan praktik terbaik Shopify terbaru

- Mengoptimalkan situs web untuk SEO dan pastikan kepatuhan dengan standar aksesibilitas web

- Membuat situs web Shopify yang menarik secara visual dan intuitif

 

Persyaratan:


- Memiliki pengetahuan dan pengalaman yang kuat dalam pengembangan Shopify, termasuk pengembangan tema, pengembangan aplikasi, dan kustomisasi.

JOB DESCRIPTION:

(1) Manage a team of UI/UX designers, overseeing their work quality and ensuring timely project delivery.

(2) Engage with potential and existing clients to identify user needs and objectives, translating them into actionable design strategies.

(3) Play a key role in product development, conducting research and providing strategic insights to drive user-centered design decisions.

(4) Efficiently allocate work among UI/UX designers, maintaining a well-balanced workload and fostering a collaborative environment.

(5) Facilitate design thinking activities and workshops with the UI/UX team and other cross-functional teams to drive innovation and problem-solving.

(6) Identify opportunities for design enhancements that align with business goals, improving user experiences and driving product success.

(7) Collaborate closely with the Engineering division to ensure smooth handover of design assets and seamless implementation.

(8) Prepare and deliver monthly reports and benchmarks to stakeholders, showcasing the impact of UI/UX initiatives and providing actionable recommendations for further improvement.

JOB REQUIREMENT:

  • Bachelor's degree in geodetic engineering, psychology, business, marketing, visual communication design, or related fields
  • Minimum 1 (one) year of experience in a supervisory or team lead role.
  • At least 3 (three) years of hands-on experience in the UI/UX field, demonstrating a strong portfolio of successful projects.
  • Proficiency in whiteboarding tools like Figma to facilitate collaborative ideation and design processes.
  • Proven expertise in using Figma for creating and iterating on design concepts, wireframes, and prototypes.
  • Excellent verbal communication skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English, enabling effective collaboration with diverse stakeholders.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Excel and Microsoft 365 suite, utilizing data analysis and visualization to inform design decisions.
  • Exceptional writing skills in Bahasa Indonesia and English, ensuring clear communication of design concepts and recommendations.
  • Ability to plan and conduct design workshops with cross-functional teams, fostering a collaborative and inclusive design culture.

About us


Populix is a consumer insights platform that helps businesses connect with its database of respondents and provides them with insights to better understand the preferences of Indonesian consumers. Populix has a pool of over 300,000 diverse, readily accessible, and highly-qualified respondents across Indonesia. Its products range from intensive research studies to simple surveys and can be arranged on a project or subscription basis. Focusing on the fact that Indonesian consumers are super sticky to their phones, Populix facilitates a diverse range of data collection methods via its mobile app.

description:

Job Description:

We are seeking a talented and experienced System Architect to join our team. As a System Architect at Sismedika, you will play a crucial role in designing and implementing complex systems that meet our business needs. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams, translate requirements into technical specifications, and ensure the scalability, reliability, and security of our systems.


Responsibilities:

  • Collaborate with stakeholders to understand business requirements and translate them into technical solutions.
  • Design and develop system architecture based on industry best practices and organizational goals.
  • Create detailed technical specifications and diagrams to guide the development team.
  • Evaluate and select appropriate technologies, tools, and platforms for system development.
  • Ensure the integration of new and existing components to achieve seamless functionality.
  • Oversee system implementation and provide technical guidance to the development team.
  • Conduct regular system assessments to identify areas for improvement, optimization, and security enhancement.
  • Stay updated with emerging technologies and trends in system architecture.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
  • Proven experience as a System Architect or a similar role in designing and implementing complex systems.
  • Strong proficiency in system design principles, software architecture, and system integration.
  • Proficiency in various programming languages, such as [List relevant programming languages].
  • Experience with cloud technologies (e.g., AWS, Azure, GCP) and microservices architecture.
  • Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to address technical challenges effectively.
  • Strong communication skills to collaborate with cross-functional teams and present complex technical concepts.


Preferred:

  • Relevant certifications in system architecture, cloud technologies, or related areas.
  • Familiarity with relevant software development methodologies.

Job Description:

We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Software Quality Assurance (SQA) professional to join our team. As an SQA, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our healthcare software solutions. You will work closely with our development team to identify and resolve defects, verify product functionality, and contribute to the delivery of top-notch healthcare applications.


Key Responsibilities:

1. Create, execute, and maintain test cases and test plans.

2. Identify, report, and track defects to resolution.

3. Conduct regression testing and performance testing.

4. Collaborate with the development team to understand product requirements.

5. Provide input on product design, functionality, and user experience.

6. Assist in continuous improvement of the software development process.

7. Stay up-to-date with industry best practices in software quality assurance.


Requirements:

1. Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.

2. Proven experience in software quality assurance, including test planning and execution.

3. Familiarity with testing tools and methodologies.

4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

5. Excellent communication and teamwork skills.

6. Detail-oriented and committed to delivering high-quality results.

7. Healthcare industry knowledge is a plus.

What We Offer:

1. Competitive compensation package.

2. Opportunities for professional development and growth.

3. Collaborative and innovative work environment.

4. Chance to make a significant impact on the healthcare industry.


How to Apply:

  • If you are passionate about quality assurance and eager to contribute to the transformation of the healthcare sector, we encourage you to apply. Please send your resume and a cover letter outlining your qualifications and why you're a great fit for the SQA role at SISMEDIKA to recruitment@sismedika.com.

Job Description:


We are seeking a talented and experienced Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in developing Java applications using Spring Boot and Quarkus, along with proficiency in Mock Testing. You will play a pivotal role in designing, implementing, and testing innovative software solutions that meet our clients' needs.

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field (or equivalent work experience).

Proven experience in software development using Java.

Strong proficiency in Spring Boot and Quarkus frameworks.

Experience with Mock Testing frameworks such as JUnit and Mockito.

Familiarity with RESTful API design and implementation.

Solid understanding of software development principles, design patterns, and best practices.

Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills.

Ability to work collaboratively in an Agile development environment.

Strong communication skills and the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

Continuous learning mindset and a passion for staying up-to-date with technology trends.

Preferred Qualifications:


Experience with microservices architecture.

Knowledge of containerization technologies (Docker, Kubernetes).

Familiarity with cloud platforms ( Google Cloud).

Previous experience working in a DevOps culture.

How to Apply:


If you meet the above qualifications and are excited about the opportunity to work on cutting-edge software projects, please submit your resume, a cover letter

About SOCA AI:

SOCA AI is a cutting-edge technology company at the forefront of generative AI voice cloning and auto dubbing. We leverage artificial intelligence to revolutionize the entertainment, dubbing, and voiceover industries. Our innovative solutions are reshaping the way content is created and localized, delivering outstanding results and driving user engagement.


Position Overview:

We are seeking a detail-oriented and enthusiastic Junior Software Quality Assurance (QA) professional to join our team. As a Junior Software QA at SOCA AI, you will play a vital role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our AI-driven software solutions. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify, document, and resolve software defects, while also contributing to the enhancement of our testing processes.


Responsibilities:


1. Test Planning: Assist in creating and maintaining test plans and strategies, ensuring comprehensive coverage of our software products.

2. Test Execution: Conduct functional, integration, and regression testing to identify software defects, verify fixes, and ensure the overall product quality.

3. Bug Tracking: Document and track defects using issue tracking tools, providing clear and detailed information to developers for resolution.

4. Test Automation: Collaborate with senior QA engineers to develop and maintain automated test scripts to streamline testing processes.

5. Collaboration: Work closely with developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to understand product requirements and user stories.

6. Documentation: Create and update test cases, test scripts, and test reports to maintain a comprehensive test documentation library.

7. Continuous Improvement: Contribute ideas and suggestions for improving QA processes and practices to enhance overall software quality.

8. Regression Testing: Perform regular regression tests to ensure that new features or changes do not introduce unexpected issues.

9. Usability Testing: Participate in usability testing to ensure our products meet user expectations and deliver a seamless experience.

10. Quality Assurance Metrics: Collect and analyze QA metrics to identify areas for improvement and track progress over time.


Qualifications:


- Min. 1 year experience as Junior Software Quality Assurance

- Strong attention to detail and a passion for delivering high-quality software.

- Familiarity with software testing methodologies, processes, and best practices.

- Basic understanding of software development concepts and programming languages (e.g., Python, Java, or JavaScript). (optional)

- Experience with testing tools such as Selenium, Katalon, or similar is a plus.

- Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

- Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and adapt to evolving priorities.

- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically.

- Eagerness to learn and grow in a fast-paced, dynamic technology company.


Why Join SOCA AI:


Be part of a cutting-edge AI technology company that is transforming industries.

Work with a passionate and talented team of professionals.

Opportunity for career growth and skill development.

Competitive salary and benefits package.

If you are a motivated individual with a passion for software quality assurance and want to contribute to the success of SOCA AI's innovative AI solutions, we encourage you to apply for this Junior Software Quality Assurance position. Join us in shaping the future of AI-driven voice cloning and auto dubbing technology!

About SOCA AI :


SOCA AI is a cutting-edge technology company at the forefront of generative AI voice cloning and auto dubbing. We leverage artificial intelligence to revolutionize the entertainment, dubbing, and voiceover industries. Our innovative solutions are reshaping the way content is created and localized, delivering outstanding results and driving user engagement.


Position Overview:

We are seeking a skilled and passionate Backend Engineer to join our dynamic team. As a Backend Engineer at SOCA AI, you will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining the backend infrastructure that powers our innovative AI-driven products. You will work closely with our cross-functional teams to drive the development of our platform and help us deliver world-class solutions to our customers.


Responsibilities:


1. Backend Development : Design, develop, test, and maintain the backend components of our voice cloning and auto dubbing platform.

2. Scalability : Optimize and scale the backend infrastructure to handle increased user demand, ensuring high availability and performance.

3. API Development : Create and maintain RESTful APIs and microservices to facilitate communication between our various product components.

4. Database Management : Manage databases, including schema design, data modeling, and optimization for efficient data retrieval.

5. Security : Implement security best practices to protect user data and ensure compliance with data privacy regulations.

6. Monitoring and Troubleshooting : Implement monitoring and alerting systems to proactively identify and resolve backend issues.

7. Collaboration : Work closely with frontend developers, data scientists, and machine learning engineers to integrate AI models and algorithms into the backend.

8. Documentation : Maintain clear and comprehensive documentation for backend systems, APIs, and processes.

9. Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) : Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines to automate testing and deployment processes.

10. Performance Optimization : Identify bottlenecks and optimize system performance for speed and efficiency.


Qualifications:


- Bachelor's or Master's Degree : A degree in computer science, software engineering, or a related field.

- Backend Development Experience : Professional experience in backend development, including expertise in one or more programming languages such as Python, Java, or Go.

- Web Frameworks : Proficiency in web frameworks (e.g., Flask, Django, Spring Boot) for building RESTful APIs.

- Database Skills : Strong knowledge of relational and non-relational databases, including SQL and NoSQL databases.

- Cloud Computing : Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes).

- Security Awareness : Understanding of security best practices, including authentication, authorization, and encryption.

- DevOps Tools : Familiarity with CI/CD tools (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI, Travis CI) and version control systems (e.g., Git).

- Problem-Solving Skills : Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to troubleshoot and optimize backend systems.

- Communication : Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional team.

- Adaptability : Willingness to learn and adapt to new technologies and tools as needed in a rapidly evolving field.

- AI Knowledge (preferred) : Familiarity with AI/ML concepts and technologies, especially related to natural language processing (NLP) and speech processing, would be a plus.

Be part of a cutting-edge AI technology company that is transforming industries.

Work with a passionate and talented team of professionals.

Opportunity for career growth and skill development.

Competitive salary and benefits package.

Jobdesk:

  • Memantau sistem dan infrastruktur teknologi operasional dalam lingkungan Command Center secara berkala, serta mengidentifikasi potensi masalah atau gangguan.
  • Merespons gangguan operasional atau insiden dengan cepat, menganalisis akar penyebabnya, dan mengambil langkah-langkah perbaikan yang diperlukan. 
  • Membuat laporan tentang insiden, masalah, atau kejadian yang terjadi dalam Command Center, serta menyusun dokumentasi yang relevan.
  • Bekerja sama dengan tim teknis dan departemen terkait untuk memastikan operasi yang mulus dan penyelesaian masalah yang efisien. 
  • Melakukan tindakan pemeliharaan preventif pada sistem dan perangkat teknologi untuk menghindari insiden yang dapat dihindari.
  • Menganalisis data operasional untuk mengidentifikasi tren dan kesempatan perbaikan dalam efisiensi dan kinerja sistem. 
  • Memantau dan melaporkan aktivitas yang mencurigakan yang mungkin berkaitan dengan keamanan operasi Command Center. 
  • Memastikan bahwa semua prosedur dan kebijakan kepatuhan diikuti dengan benar. 
  • Terus meningkatkan pemahaman teknis Anda dan mengikuti pelatihan yang diperlukan untuk memahami teknologi yang digunakan dalam Command Center. 
  • Berkontribusi pada perencanaan dan pelaksanaan strategi kontinuitas bisnis untuk memastikan kelancaran operasi dalam situasi darurat atau insiden.

FORMULATRIX supplies innovative software and robotic automation solutions to the life science industry, including leading pharmaceutical companies and academic research institutions around the world. We collaborate with researchers to simplify scientific workflows, such as sample preparation and analysis, by designing solutions without boundaries and bringing novel cutting-edge technology into the laboratory. We are committed to researchers, their labs, and the scientific discoveries that will improve the lives of generations to come.

We are seeking hands-on, top-notch Software Engineers who are experienced in leading a team, can work with Object-Oriented Programming, and have expertise in C# / C++/ Java to implement components of our software products and robotic control systems.

Requirements:

  • Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Electronic Engineering, or equivalent professional experience in software development.
  • Have experience with a complete software development life cycle.
  • Solid experience of at least 4 years in C# / C++/ Java is preferable (combining these three is also acceptable).
  • Demonstrate experience with system architecture review, OOP, and software programming in a team environment.
  • Good grasp and used best practices in programming.
  • Excellent communication skills in English, both oral and written.
  • Applicant must be willing to work (onsite) in Bandung.

description:
Requirements

Job Description

  • Mapping userâ€™s requirement with IT Team

What you will do:

  • Analyze machine learning algorithms that could be used to solve a given problem and rank them based on their cost & benefit.
  • Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve ML models/infrastructure and software that uses these models.
  • Build libraries and frameworks that support large, complex web applications.
  • Contribute to engineering efforts from planning and organization to execution and delivery to solve complex, real-world engineering problems.
  • Develop and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture.

What you will need:

  • Able to solve complex business problem and apply machine learning to optimize critical business metrics.
  • Have solid knowledge in root-cause analysis, statistical, time-series, or predictive modelling skills.
  • Able to manage multiple projects with competing priorities.
  • Proficiency in using various database platform such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, Hive, Bigquery, etc.
  • Proficiency in Python, R, Spark, Big Data Platforms, etc.
  • Proficiency in using data visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BI, etc.
  • Proficiency in cloud using Microsoft Azure Machine Learning.
  • Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases.
  • Experience building and optimizing â€˜big dataâ€™ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.
  • Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
  • Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.
  • Proficiency in cloud using Microsoft Azure Data Factory, Azure Synapse.

What you will do:

  • Developing and maintaining ETL pipelines from various data sources.

  • Testing developed features or functions to validate that they are working as expected.

  • Create a conceptual model and system specification.
  • Coordination with user internal and external.
  • Analyze technical specifications from clientâ€™s needs.
  • Create update report project.


What you will need:

  • Have been involved in an IT project with roles as Data Engineer for at least 2 years.

  • Background with distributed framework (e.g. Spark, Hadoop, Kafka Streams).
  • Workflow management or data pipelines (e.g. Airflow, Azure Data Factory, SSIS).
  • Experience with relational databases (e.g. SQL Server, MySQL), exposure to no-SQL appliances and a variety of databases (e.g. Cosmo DB, Elastic Search, Kafka, Hive, etc.).
  • Experience in writing software for data extraction and transformation in one or more languages (e.g. Python, Scala, or Java).
  • Good understanding of Windows/UNIX/LINUX environments.
  • Highly skilled in writing and optimizing SQL queries.
  • Experienced in building data model for Data Warehouse, Data Lake.
  • Familiar with SDLC, Object-Oriented Design Patterns.
  • Highly motivated with spirit to learn new things.
  • Good attitude, commitment to work and good team player.
  • Good problem solving, analytical and leadership skill.
  • Ability to work independently or in a group.
  • Able to manage task and deadline.
  • Ability to adapt and have flexibility within a high-growth organization.
  • Must be able to clearly communicate to product development stakeholders: Other Engineers, Testers, Project Managers, Team Lead, etc.
  • Anticipate issues and act proactively to address potential issues serve as a subjectâ€¯matterâ€¯expert.


Additional Qualities:

  • Experience in ETL (extract, transform, load) data pipeline (e.g Azure Data Factory SSIS) and,
  • Experience in Business Intelligence Platforms (e.g Microsoft Power BI, Tableu, QlikView).

What you will do:

  • Build and maintain infrastructures in the cloud and on-premise, using modern infrastructure services such as Docker, Kubernetes, and serverless computing.
  • Build automation solution to make developer and internal team easier and more productive.
  • Deploy applications into several environments.
  • Monitor and maintain infrastructure health, scalability and security.
  • Research new technologies to improve and optimize our infrastructure.


What you will need:

  • Proven experiences as DevOps Engineer, minimum 2 years.
  • Understand cloud computing concept, experience with Azure, GCP, AWS, and other is a plus.
  • Strong in using Linux server and scripting languages.
  • Knowledge in basic networking skills.
  • Experience using Virtualization, Docker and Kubernetes.
  • Understand database system.
  • Experience using CI/CD tools.
  • Eager to continuously learn new skills, as well as self-motivated in keeping up with the latest trends in DevOps & System Architecture.
  • Good attitude, commitment to work and good team player.
  • Good problem solving and analytical skill.
  • Ability to adapt and have flexibility within a high-growth organization

What you will do:

  • Developing web application and APIs.

What you will need:

  • At least 3 years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer.

  • Proven experience in application development with microservices architecture.

  • In-depth understanding of web application development concepts, application architecture, UI/UX design, database management.

What you will do:

description:
Job Description :

  • Provide strategic and tactical advise to business/executive leadership on talent management, effective and productive workforce management, succession planning and organization design.
  • Manage and develop Human Resources strategic strategies, programs and processes and maintain full strategic responsibility to align with business direction and goals.
  • Partner with internal key stakeholders to help build organizational capability & competency through HR initiatives, to help achieve business goals.
  • Develop and implement HR processes & policies, lead all aspects of HR related initiatives including but not limited to performance management, employee relations, compensation and benefits, and talent management.
  • Manage labour issues, people development and perform advisory role.
  • Handle critical issues related to recruitment, employee relation and employment engagement.
  • Work with our leaders to define people priorities that align with the experience we want to create for our employee.
  • Bridge management and employee relations by addressing demands, grievances or other issues.
  • Oversee and manage employee performance appraisal system that drives high performance.
  • Maintain pay plan and employee benefits program.
  • Lead, coach, mentor
  • and build the capabilities of HR team to be operationally strong.


Requirement :

  • At least 5 years of solid experience in handling end-to-end Human Resources Management in managerial/leadership level, and preferably in the digital & technology industry.
  • In-depth knowledge of employment law and HR best practices.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced high pressure working culture.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and stakeholder management.
  • Experiences in organizational design, culture building, evaluating and revamping HR strategies and processes aligned with business.
  • Demonstrated leadership skills in not only managing HR team but also change driver across the organization.
  • Proven strategic thinking and commercial acumen to translate business objectives into HR strategies.

.

IT Helpdesk Level 1:

  • Responding to incoming calls, emails, or support tickets from end-users experiencing technical issues.
  • Providing basic technical assistance and troubleshooting for common problems such as password resets, software installations, printer issues, and network connectivity problems.
  • Documenting support requests, resolutions, and maintaining a knowledge base of frequently asked questions and their solutions.
  • Escalating more complex issues to Level 2 or Level 3 support technicians.
  • Assisting with user account management, including creating and deleting user accounts and modifying permissions.
  • Conducting initial diagnostics and gathering relevant information to effectively escalate issues to higher-level support teams if necessary.
  • Providing excellent customer service and maintaining a professional and courteous demeanor at all times.

IT Helpdesk Level 2:

  • Handling more advanced technical issues that Level 1 support couldn't resolve.
  • Providing in-depth troubleshooting and problem-solving for hardware, software, and network-related problems.
  • Assisting with the installation, configuration, and maintenance of computer systems, software applications, and peripheral devices.
  • Investigating and resolving issues related to user accounts, permissions, and security.
  • Collaborating with other IT teams, such as network or system administrators, to resolve complex issues.
  • Conducting research and staying up to date with the latest technologies and trends to provide effective support.
  • Mentoring and providing guidance to Level 1 support technicians.
  • Participating in the development and improvement of support processes and procedures.

IT Helpdesk Level 3:

  • Handling the most complex and critical technical issues that require specialized knowledge and expertise.
  • Providing advanced troubleshooting and support for servers, networks, and infrastructure-related problems.
  • Managing and resolving escalated incidents and service requests.
  • Developing and implementing advanced technical solutions to improve system performance, security, and reliability.
  • Collaborating with other IT teams, such as system administrators, database administrators, and security analysts, to resolve complex issues.
  • Conducting root cause analysis and implementing preventive measures to minimize recurring problems.
  • Assisting in the design, implementation, and maintenance of IT infrastructure and systems.
  • Providing guidance, training, and mentoring to Level 1 and Level 2 support technicians.
  • Participating in on-call rotations and providing 24/7 support when required.

Requirements

  • Pendidikan minimal S1 Teknik Informatika/Ilmu Komputer/Sistem Informatika
  • Pengalaman 3 tahun di IT Helpdesk Bersedia bekerja secara shifting
  • Memiliki keterampilan yang baik dalam SQL Server, Visual Basic, Crystal Report, Visual Studio Pembelajar yang cepat, komunikasi yang baik, dan orang yang berorientasi pada target
  • Memiliki kemampuan yang baik dalam pemecahan masalah
  • Memiliki pengetahuan tentang sistem operasi (Windows, Linux, atau macOS) dan perangkat keras komputer
  • Pemahaman tentang aplikasi perangkat lunak umum dan perangkat lunak perbankan

Codevergence is a dynamic and innovative IT consultant company. We seek a talented and motivated DevOps Engineer to join our growing team and play a crucial role in optimising our development and operations processes.

Job Description:

As a DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for bridging the gap between development and operations teams, ensuring a seamless and efficient software delivery pipeline. Your primary focus will be on implementing best practices for automation, continuous integration, and continuous deployment. You will work closely with software developers, system administrators, and other stakeholders to streamline our development processes and enhance the overall reliability and performance of our systems.

company: PT. Tiga Daya Digital Indonesia (EKSAD Technology)
description:
We are dedicated to maintaining a strong IT infrastructure and ensuring cybersecurity in the banking sector. Joining our IT Infra & Security Team means becoming part of a dynamic group of professionals committed to protecting our systems, data, and our customers' trust. We value innovation, collaboration, and a proactive approach to addressing IT infrastructure and security challenges.


Get to Know our Team!

You'll work with a team of IT infrastructure and cybersecurity professionals passionate about safeguarding our digital assets. This collaborative team closely collaborates with various stakeholders to maintain a robust IT infrastructure and security posture. Together, we ensure that we remain at the forefront of IT and cybersecurity in the banking industry.


Get to Know the Role!

As an IT Infra & Security Project Manager, you'll play an essential role in supporting our IT infrastructure and cybersecurity projects. Here's a summary of what you can expect:

Responsibilities:

  • Project Support and Coordination: Assist in the coordination and support of IT infrastructure and cybersecurity projects. Work with the project manager to ensure projects are delivered on time and within scope.
  • Documentation and Reporting: Maintain project documentation, including plans, progress, and outcomes. Help generate reports on project status and milestones.
  • Risk Management: Assist in identifying and assessing project-related risks and issues. Collaborate on implementing risk mitigation strategies.
  • Stakeholder Communication: Communicate project updates and outcomes effectively to stakeholders. Collaborate with team members and ensure project deliverables align with the organization's standards.


The Must-Haves:

  • Bachelor's degree in a relevant field.
  • 1-3 years of experience in IT infrastructure, Infosec, or Cyber Security project support.
  • Basic understanding of IT infrastructure and cybersecurity principles, including network security, data protection, access controls, and encryption.
  • Familiarity with project coordination and documentation.
  • Ability to work collaboratively within teams and engage with stakeholders.
  • Strong communication skills to interact proficiently with a range of stakeholders.


The Nice to Haves:

  • Interest in the banking sector or a highly regulated industry.
  • Any relevant certifications or coursework related to IT infrastructure or cybersecurity.
  • Familiarity with IT infrastructure and cybersecurity frameworks and standards.
  • Eagerness to learn and grow in the IT infrastructure and cybersecurity field.


Join us as EKSADian in a role that provides valuable experience in IT infrastructure and cybersecurity project support. If you're eager to contribute, learn, and be part of a dedicated team, we invite you to apply. Together, we'll continue to strengthen the IT and security foundations that protect our customers' trust.

This role focuses on the development and maintenance of our e-commerce backend systems, with a strong emphasis on API development and payment gateway integration.


Key Responsibilities:

- Develop and maintain APIs using Laravel for our e-commerce platforms.

- Integrate various payment gateways into our systems.

- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.

- Collaborate with front-end developers to integrate user-facing elements with server-side logic.

- Manage database and application server.

- Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.


Qualifications:

- Minimum of 1 years of experience in Laravel backend development.

- Proven experience in e-commerce and payment gateway integration.

- Strong knowledge of API design and development.

- Proficient in database management (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.).

- Familiarity with version control tools (Git).

- Excellent teamwork skills with a problem-solving attitude.


Benefits:

- Focused Product Development: Concentrate your talents on a single, impactful product, ensuring a deep understanding and mastery over time.

- Long-Term Journey: Embark on a stable and rewarding career path with us, with opportunities to grow and evolve as our product and team expand.

- Opportunity for Growth: We provide a platform for professional development and opportunities to advance in your career.

- Great Working Environment: Join a team of passionate professionals in a supportive and collaborative workplace.


Location:

  • Bandung - Onsite

sector: Marketplace & Top Up Item Game Online
description:
(About Us)

PT Gamebit Digital Indonesia is a dynamic and growing startup revolutionizing the online gaming industry with Gamebit (gamebit.co.id). Our innovative platform is the go-to destination for gamers to find the best deals on in-game items and top-ups. We are committed to providing a seamless and secure user experience for gamers across Indonesia and beyond.


(The Role)

We're seeking a talented and experienced Full Stack Web Developer to join our team and play a crucial role in shaping the future of Gamebit. You'll have the opportunity to contribute to all aspects of our web platform, from building engaging front-end features to designing robust back-end systems.


(Responsibilities)

Front-end Development

  • Design and implement intuitive, responsive, and performant user interfaces using React and Next.js.
  • Ensure strong user experience (UX) principles throughout the development process.
  • Integrate front-end components with back-end APIs.
  • Optimize web applications for speed, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility.


Back-end Development

  • Develop scalable and maintainable RESTful APIs and services using Laravel.
  • Design and manage efficient database structures to support platform features.
  • Implement secure user authentication and authorization systems.
  • Integrate with payment gateways and external services.


Collaboration and Best Practices

  • Participate in code reviews and contribute to our evolving development standards.
  • Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other members of the development team to deliver outstanding solutions.
  • Stay up-to-date with the latest web development trends and technologies.


(Qualifications)

Required

- Minimum 2+ years of proven professional experience as a full-stack web developer.

- In-depth expertise in React, Next.js, and Laravel.

- Strong understanding of JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.

- Experience with relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL).

- Familiarity with version control (Git).


Highly Desirable

- Experience with payment gateway integration (e.g., Midtrans, Xendit, etc.).

- Knowledge of web security best practices.

- Understanding of web performance optimization techniques.

- Experience in a startup or agile development environment.

- Experience in the gaming industry or building e-commerce platforms.


(What We Offer)

- A dynamic and collaborative work environment where your contributions will make a real impact.

- The opportunity to work on a cutting-edge product in the exciting gaming industry.

- Competitive salary and benefits package.

- Potential for professional growth and advancement within the company.


(To Apply)

Please submit your CV, portfolio (including links to relevant projects), and a short cover letter explaining your interest in joining Gamebit.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

DIGISIGN is an Indonesian public service for electric signatures with attached time stamps for documents and electronic transactions.   9. Berperan sebagai Purple Team (basic & wajib)

position: DIGISIGN.ID (PT. Solusi Net Internusa) Job Hiring!
description:
Responsibilities

  1. Bertanggung jawab untuk mencapai target penjualan dengan menjual produk atau layanan perusahaan kepada calon pelanggan. 
  2. Mencari dan mengidentifikasi peluang-peluang bisnis baru serta prospek potensial untuk mengembangkan jaringan pelanggan. 
  3. Berkomunikasi dengan pelanggan potensial dan yang sudah ada untuk memahami kebutuhan mereka, memberikan informasi tentang produk atau layanan, dan menjawab pertanyaan mereka. 
  4. Mempersiapkan penawaran, bernegosiasi tentang harga, syarat-syarat penjualan, dan kontrak dengan pelanggan. 
  5. Melaporkan hasil penjualan secara berkala kepada manajemen, termasuk pencapaian target penjualan dan perkembangan pasar. 
  6. Menjalin hubungan baik dengan pelanggan untuk mempertahankan loyalitas mereka dan meningkatkan retensi. 
  7. Mengamati tren pasar, analisis pesaing, dan kebutuhan pelanggan untuk mengidentifikasi peluang penjualan baru. 
  8. Berkolaborasi dengan tim penjualan dan manajemen untuk menyusun strategi penjualan yang efektif

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

  • Mengembangkan dan melaksanakan strategi penjualan untuk mencapai target pertumbuhan.
  • Berkomunikasi dengan calon klien, menyajikan produk atau layanan perusahaan, dan bernegosiasi untuk mencapai kesepakatan yang saling menguntungkan.
  • Menjaga hubungan baik dengan klien, memastikan kepuasan pelanggan, dan membangun jaringan yang kuat.
  • Melakukan analisis pasar untuk memahami tren dan peluang potensial.
  • Melaporkan hasil penjualan dan pencapaian target secara berkala kepada manajemen.
  • Bekerja sama dengan tim penjualan dan tim lainnya untuk mencapai tujuan perusahaan.

position: AI / NLP (Natural Language Processing) Developer Intern
description:
Omnifit mencari NLP Engineer untuk bersama-sama mengubah dunia kesehatan menjadi lebih baik:


[Deskripsi Pekerjaan]

- Melakukan preparasi dan pengembangan dataset yang sudah ada untuk pelatihan dan improvisasi model NLP di Android App

- Menganalisis performa model, merancang, dan melakukan implementasi pengembangan model NLP

- Mengkonfigurasi pemodelan sistem NLP dan maintenance pada server untuk sistem Question Answering (QA)


[Pengalaman dan kemampuan]

- Minimal S1 di bidang STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics)

- Berpengalaman dalam mengembangkan model AI atau NLP dalam (min. 3-6 bulan)

- Menguasai bahasa pemrograman Python dan library dasar seperti Pandas, Numpy, dan sci kit learn

- Bersedia bekerja di Jakarta Timur dan mampu berkomunikasi dengan baik dengan tim


[Lebih Disukai / Preferred]

- Menguasai salah satu atau lebih syarat di bawah ini :

1. Memahami cara kerja Pretrained Language Model (BERT, LlaMA, GPT, dll.) dan Information Retrieval

2. Memiliki pengalaman dengan menggunakan PyTorch

3. Pernah membuat dan mengembangkan NLP di Android

Job Requirements

* Pendidikan minimal S1 Ilmu komputer/ Sistem Informasi/ Informasi teknologi

* Sedang aktif kuliah minimal semester 5

* Pengetahuan dan pengalaman yang kuat dalam back-end (Javascript / NodeJS / ExpressJS / Laravel / PHP)

* Pengetahuan dan pengalaman dengan cloud database Firebase, AWS / Azure

* Pengalaman dengan Linux/Unix dan manajemen server

* Keahlian dalam penggunaan alat manajemen kode seperti Git

* Pengetahuan tentang arsitektur MVC & OOP


Job Descriptions

* Membangun perangkat lunak yang kuat dan skalabel dengan membangun fitur baru, debugging, dan mengoptimalkan aplikasi

* Membangun back end web app untuk berbagai users

* Menulis kode bersih untuk mengembangkan aplikasi web fungsional

* Berkolaborasi dengan pengembang front-end untuk mengintegrasikan elemen yang terlihat oleh pengguna dengan logika sisi server

* Mengembangkan dan mengusulkan produk atau fitur baru dengan memantau industri

* Bekerja sama dengan desainer, manajer produk, dan administrator sistem untuk mengidentifikasi dan membangun fitur baru

* Membangun struktur database yang efisien dan efektif untuk digunakan di web dan mobile app
