position: Java Based Full Stack Web Developer
description:
Job Description

  • Working alongside Tech & Product team to develop engaging and responsive user interfaces with HTML, CSS, and modern javascript framework
  • Develop performance oriented front end & back end binding
  • Perform code reviews and basic troubleshooting
  • Build reusable code and libraries for further use

Job Requirement

  • Bachelor Degree with Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent
  • Having knowledge or experience about Springboot and / or Angular.
  • Managing multiple tasks and timeline in fast-pace environment
  • Eager to learn and a strong team player
  • Humility and excellent collaborative spirit
  • Location: Jakarta

Job Descriptions:

  • Configure and maintain internal/external server (Linux, Windows, NAS, Active Directory),
  • Configure and maintain internal/external networks (VPN, Router, NAT, DHCP),
  • Design, set up, and maintain internal/external (Cloud) storage and backup,
  • Troubleshoot and analyze logs on server and network devices failures,
  • Maintain infrastructure documentations,
  • Report or update task progress via internal ticketing system or shared documents,
  • Visit data center and clients for infrastructure trouble shootings or infrastructure health checkups


Requirements:

  • Maximum age 35 years old,
  • Candidate must possess at least an Associate Degree in information system or related fields,
  • Minimum 1 year experience network or system administration,
  • Experience with setting up OS and application servers such as SQL, web server, mail server, LDAP, and so on,
  • Experience with network design and basic network devices such as routers, switches, firewall, access point, and so on,
  • Familiar with docker and virtualization technologies such as VM, AWS, and google cloud,
  • Familiarity with container and CI/CD is a plus point,
  • Have a strong passion in system or network administration,
  • Strong team work attitude, independent, and problem solving oriented.

Currently, we provide intensive coding bootcamp, corporate training, and part-time courses for on-demand digital skills. At Skilvul, we treat each other with respect and communicate with empathy. We support each other even though it is not part of our job description.

We expect you to prioritize and fulfill your responsibilities, but you are also welcome to pursue your hobbies, spend time with your family, hang out with friends, and do other stuff that you are passionate about. We hope that you can have a more meaningful and purposeful life by working at Skilvul.


We are looking for a knowledgeable and experienced Data Scientist and AI Engineer to be a Mentor for our  You will be working directly with the Technical Lead and Instructor to be a group mentor for our students. You must give live video mentoring via Zoom and chat via Slack/Discord . You can work from anywhere as long as you have a steady internet connection.


 paid, remote, part-time positionfor 4 months from 12 March - 21 June 2024What you'll do

  • Giving live video mentoring via Zoom and chat via Slack/Discord for a group of students
  • Collaborate with Technical Lead and Instructor to make sure learning outcomes are achieved
  • Becoming a facilitator for students in group mentoring or one-on-one session
  • Providing guidance, advice, feedback, and support to students in following the program
  • Facilitating students while they are doing their work assignments and final project
  • Have a strong desire to assist students from Senior High School, Vocational Students, College Students, Fresh Graduates, and already have a job from diverse backgrounds in developing digital products


What will make you stand out

  • Major in Computer Science / Engineering / Business
  • Professional experience building various AI/Machine Learning applications
  • Having previous experience in teaching or mentoring
  • Experience writing educational content that reaches a wide audience in a digital format
  • A strong written & spoken English
  • Good public speaking skills


For more details: https://bit.ly/JobScope-DataScienceAIMentor

Responsibilities

  • Melakukan monitoring kinerja operasional seluruh sistem keamanan IT perusahaan
  • Memonitor kegiatan operasional dan pemeliharaan perangkat keamanan informasi (hardware maupun software)
  • Mengelola User Access Management (aplikasi hingga server) yang mencakup penambahan - pengalihan/perubahan - penghapusan user, reset password, IP Address, dst
  • Mengelola key management (kunci enkripsi) yang digunakan seluruh platform IT perusahaan
  • Mengelola kegiatan pendeteksian ancaman siber beserta analisis dan tindak lanjut terhadap insiden yang terjadi
  • Mengelola penerapan teknologi dan framework proses deteksi ancaman siber beserta analisis dan standar respon penanganan insiden yang terjadi
  • Melakukan vulnerability assessment terhadap seluruh sistem keamanan IT secara berkala
  • Mengelola kegiatan Digital Forensic Investigation dalam rangka tindak lanjut penanganan insiden keamanan siber yang terjadi

Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and implement web applications using the Laravel PHP framework.

  • Collaborate with other team members, users, project manager and other developers to define requirements, prioritize tasks, and deliver projects on time and within budget.
  • Conduct unit and integration tests to ensure code quality and functionality.
  • Identify and resolve bugs and defects to maintain a high level of application performance.
  • Implement and maintain security best practices to protect user data and system integrity.
  • Stay up-to-date on the latest trends and technologies in web development, including AI, Cloud, and IoT. Be willing to learn and implement new technologies to improve applications and workflows.
  • Deploy applications to production environments and monitor their performance.
  • Continuously improve and optimize application code for performance and scalability.
  • Document technical specifications, user guides, and API documentation.


Qualifications:

Skills:

  • Proven experience in web application development using the Laravel PHP framework.
  • Strong understanding of object-oriented programming principles and design patterns.
  • Familiarity with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various JavaScript libraries.
  • Solid experience with Microsoft SQL Server (MS SQL) and database management systems.
  • Experience with unit testing frameworks like PHPUnit.
  • Understanding of web security best practices.
  • Experience with version control systems like Git and CI/CD pipelines.
  • Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and critical thinking skills.
  • Strong written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to communicate technical concepts effectively to non-technical audiences.
  • Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
  • A passion for web development and a strong desire to learn and implement new technologies such as AI, Cloud, and IoT.

Job Responsibilities

  • Selecting appropriate Cloud services to design and deploy an application based on given requirements.
  • Migrating complex, multi-tier applications on Cloud Platforms. Designing and deploying enterprise-wide scalable operations on Cloud Platforms.
  • Relevant years of experience in Cloud Infrastructure and Operations domains
  • Experience with Linux systems and / OR Windows servers
  • Specialize in one or two cloud deployment platforms: AWS, GCP.
  • Hands-on experience with AWS services (EKS, ECS, EC2, VPC, RDS, Lambda, GKE, Compute Engine).
  • Experience with one or more programming languages (Python, JavaScript, Ruby, Java,.Net)
  • Skills for developing, deploying & debugging cloud applications.
  • Logging and Monitoring tools (ELK, Stackdriver, CloudWatch) effectively.
  • Skilled in DevOps Technologies.
  • Knowledge of Configuration Management tools such as Ansible, Terraform, Puppet, Chef.
  • Experience working with deployment and orchestration technologies (such as Docker, Kubernetes, and Mesos)


Qualification

  • Passion to tech-awesome, an insatiable desire to learn the latest of the new-age cloud tech, highly analytical aptitude, and a strong â€˜desire to deliverâ€™ outlives those fancy degrees!
  • Relevant years of experience with hands-on experience in Cloud Computing (AWS/GCP) and IT operational experience in a global enterprise environment.
  • Good analytical, communication, problem-solving, and learning skills.

As a Data Engineer, you are a full-stack data engineer that loves solving business problems. You work with business leads, analysts and data scientists to understand the business domain and engage with fellow engineers to build data products that empower better decision making. You are passionate about data quality of our business metrics and flexibility of your solution that scales to respond to broader business questions. If you love to solve problems using your skills, then come join the Team Searce. We have a casual and fun office environment that actively steers clear of rigid "corporate" culture, focuses on productivity and creativity, and allows you to be part of a world-class team while still being yourself.

  • Consistently strive to acquire new skills on Cloud, DevOps, Big Data, AI and ML
  • Understand the business problem and translate these to data services and engineering outcomes
  • Explore new technologies and learn new techniques to solve business problems creatively
  • Think big! and drive the strategy for better data quality for the customers
  • Collaborate with many teams - engineering and business, to build better data products


Preferred Qualifications

  • A maximum of 2 years work experience since university graduation.
  • Hands-on experience of any one programming language (Python, Java, Scala)
  • Understanding of SQL is must
  • Big data (Hadoop, Hive, Yarn, Sqoop)
  • MPP platforms (Spark, Pig, Presto)
  • Data-pipeline & schedular tool (Ozzie, Airflow, Nifi)
  • Streaming engines (Kafka, Storm, Spark Streaming)
  • Any Relational database or DW experience
  • Any ETL tool experience
  • Hands-on experience in pipeline design, ETL and application development
  • Good communication skills
  • Experience in working independently and strong analytical skills
  • Dependable and good team player
  • Desire to learn and work with new technologies
  • Automation in your blood

  17. Kemampuan Berkomunikasi:

  19. Pemahaman Keamanan:
  20. Kesadaran akan praktik keamanan web dan kemampuan untuk mengimplementasikannya dalam proyek-proyek WordPress.
  21. Keterlibatan dalam komunitas pengembangan WordPress, serta keinginan untuk terus belajar dan mengikuti perkembangan terbaru di dunia web development.

Are you a Dynamic Duo: MS Dynamics & .NET Mastermind?

We're searching for a Senior .NET Developer to join our team and drive the development of high-impact business solutions using MS Dynamics and .NET. If you thrive in challenging environments, love building complex systems, and have a passion for automating workflows, then read on!

What You'll Do:

  • Lead the design, development, and deployment of robust .NET applications for enterprise-level MS Dynamics implementations.
  • Deep dive into business requirements, translating them into efficient and scalable technical solutions.
  • Collaborate with Dynamics consultants and architects to architect, develop, and customize Dynamics extensions.
  • Leverage your .NET expertise to integrate Dynamics with other systems and platforms.
  • Champion automation through PowerApps development, streamlining processes and boosting user productivity.
  • Mentor and guide junior developers, promoting best practices and technical excellence.


What You Bring:

  • 3-5 years of hands-on experience developing with .NET Framework (C#, ASP.NET MVC, etc.).
  • 3-5 years of proven experience implementing and customizing MS Dynamics AX or 365, ideally in complex, large-scale projects.
  • Solid understanding of Dynamics architecture, development tools, and customization methods.
  • Hands-on knowledge of PowerApps and its capabilities for workflow automation.
  • Excellent communication, collaboration, and problem-solving skills.
  • A passion for learning and staying ahead of the curve in .NET and Dynamics.


What We Offer:

  • The opportunity to make a real impact on our business and empower our customers through innovative technology solutions.
  • A dynamic and collaborative work environment where your ideas are valued and contributions are celebrated.
  • Competitive salary and benefits package.
  • Continuous learning and development opportunities to stay ahead of the game.


If you're a seasoned .NET developer with a deep understanding of MS Dynamics and a knack for automation, we invite you to join our team and unleash your full potential.

A Learning and Development (L&D) Officer is responsible for planning, implementing, and managing training and development programs within an organization. Key responsibilities include analyzing learning needs, designing relevant modules, overseeing program implementation, and utilizing learning management systems. Require strong interpersonal and communication skills, attention to detail, and proficiency in tools. The L&D Officer plays a vital role in enhancing employee skills and knowledge while supporting the overall goals and initiatives of the organization. 

Job descriptions: 

  • Conducting Need Analysis (NA) for the training and development needs of Employees 
  • Designing, Organizing and Evaluating development programs according to the planned schedule and preparing the necessary materials, equipment, and costs to ensure the smooth implementation of the development program and the achievement of its objectives. 
  • Documenting activities to ensure the availability of accurate and up-to-date databases related to employee training and development. 
  • Organizing new employee orientation programs in the company to ensure an understanding of the values/norms within the company. 
  •  Managing and monitoring the e-learning process in the LMS App. From course design, material input, report generation, news posting, group creation, and updating the employee database in the LMS App to ensure the data and development materials are valid. 
  • Actively considering the development of LMS App related to user experience, user interface, and necessary features to support the learning process in VisioNet. 
  • Supporting programs or activities organized by the company.

Requirements: 

  •  A Bachelor's degree in Psychology or Educational Technology and having experience as an L&D Officer for min. 1 year. 
  • Attention to detail and a commitment to accuracy in record-keeping.
  •  Experience in training management and delivering training. 
  • Ability to conduct Learning Needs Analysis, Module Development, and Learning Implementation. 
  • Familiarity with a Learning Management System (LMS). 
  • Proactive attitude and a willingness to take initiative. 
  • Strong interpersonal skills, communication skills, presentation skills, and class management. 
  •  Excellent computer literacy (MS Office). 
  •  Willing to work at Karawaci, Tangerang.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

Pria / Wanita

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

 Merancang struktur dari program/aplikasi dengan bantuan tools seperti Trello dan Jira

- Mendesain program dengan bantuan tools seperti Figma dan Adobexd

- Mengembangkan program yang sudah didesain dengan pilihan bahasa pemrograman, semisal Golang, Python, SQL, dan Javascript

- Menguji (testing) fitur-fitur dalam program

- Melakukan deploy atau mengimplementasikan program komputer ke semua target perangkat mulai dari mobile sampai desktop.

- Merawat atau maintaining setelah versi akhir dirilis ke user

Responsibilities

  • Membuat atau memodifikasi program yang sudah ada.
  • Bertanggung jawab dalam mengelola program.

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

  • Mengembangkan antarmuka pengguna dengan menulis kode untuk mengimplementasikan elemen visual
  • Membuat prototype, mockup, dan situs staging untuk ditinjau dan mendapatkan umpan balik
  • Mengoptimalkan situs web dan aplikasi agar cepat dimuat
  • Desain untuk optimalisasi mobile
  • Menangani dan memecahkan berbagai masalah situs web dan masalah pemrograman
  • Mengembangkan dan mengusulkan produk atau fitur baru dengan memantau pengguna


Job Requirements

  • Pendidikan minimal S1 Ilmu komputer/ Sistem Informasi/ Informasi teknologi
  • Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang yang sama
  • Bersedia bekerja dalam tim
  • Memahami ReactJS, MySQL, Linux, Apache/Nginx, HTML, CSS, jQuery
  • Mengerti framework Laravel / CI
  • Berpengalaman dalam menggunakan Git
  • Kemampuan untuk mengimplementasikan desain web
  • Memiliki Sertifikat BNSP/Sejenis (Optional)
  • Bersedia bekerja on-site di Jogja

Qualifications

  • S1 T. Informatika/S1 Sistem Informasi/S1 Ilmu Komputer
  • Fresh Graduate diutamakan
  • Bersedia bekerja dalam TIM
  • Memiliki Skill Komunikasi yang baik
  • Memahami MySQL, Linux, dan Apache/Nginx dan jQuery
  • Memahami PHP. (mengerti antara Golang/Node.JS) --> menjadi nilai pertimbangan lebih
  • Memahami dan mengaplikasi RESTful API dan JSON/XML
  • Mengetahui Framework seperti CI/Laravel
  • Berpengalaman dalam menggunakan GIT
  • Memiliki Sertifikat BNSP (Optional)
  • Bersedia untuk WFO di Yogyakarta

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

  • Mencari kandidat yang dibutuhkan perusahaan
  • Melakukan interview dan proses kandidat secara end to end
  • Melakukan koordinasi kepada head office untuk level dibutuhkan
  • Melakukan input pendataan kandidat yang diinterview di excel dijadikan database
  • Mengirimkan kandidat yang sudah diinterview melalu email
  • Mendampingi kandidat yang mau interview secara langsung ditempat user/klien


Kualifikasi Kandidat

  • Pria atau Wanita usia sehat jasmani dan rohani
  • Pendidikan terakhir Sarjana semua jurusan
  • Mempunyai pengalaman HRD atau interviewer silahkan
  • Diutamakan mempunyai basic rekrutmen
  • Sudah terbiasa menggunakan excel untuk pengelolaan data
  • Sudah terbiasa membuat laporan kerja
  • Komunikasi fast respon
  • Aktif di media sosial
Deskripsi Pekerjaan

PRIEDS is an emerging tech startup in the ERP & IoT business solutions industry and a part of TELKOM Indonesia. We are growing rapidly and need an agile team to come onboard with us in the fantastic journey to the future of Industrial Revolution 4.0. We are a technology consultant for enterprises who solve problems for various industries through our Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Internet of Things (IoT) solutions. We are growing very fast and thus, we need you to join our team! We are hiring a full stack engineer to work with our agile product team. For those who want to work dynamically and are challenged with different types of projects, this is the right one for you!

Responsibilities:

  • Develop responsive web interfaces using Angular, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure optimal user experience across various devices and browsers.
  • Collaborate with designers to translate wireframes and mockups into interactive user interfaces, ensuring a seamless and visually appealing experience.
  • Implement and maintain frontend architecture and best practices, including code quality, performance optimization, and maintainability.
  • Integrate frontend components with backend APIs, ensuring efficient and reliable data transfer.
  • Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to ensure high-quality code standards and adherence to best practices.
  • Identify and troubleshoot frontend-related issues and bugs, ensuring timely resolution and maintaining application stability.
  • Stay updated with the latest frontend development trends and technologies, particularly related to Angular, and proactively suggest improvements and optimizations.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, backend developers, and project managers, to ensure successful project delivery.


Requirements:

  • Proven experience as a Frontend Developer with a strong focus on Angular development.
  • Solid understanding of web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and RESTful APIs.
  • Proficiency in Angular, including components, services, and routing.
  • Familiarity with frontend development tools and frameworks, such as TypeScript, SCSS, Bootstrap, or Material UI.
  • Experience with version control systems, preferably Git.
  • Understanding of responsive design principles.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and ability to analyze and debug frontend issues.
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively within a team.
  • Attention to detail and commitment to delivering high-quality code.
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (preferred) or equivalent practical experience
  • If you dream of having a job with flexible working arrangement and thriving in the real start-up world, come join us!

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

Vendor, Manpower, Prize pool Agreement Letter Management:

  • Prepare and draft agreement letters for external manpower, vendors, and other stakeholders as required.
  • Ensure agreement letters are compliant with company policies and legal requirements.
  • Maintain a template library for agreement letters to streamline the process.


Follow-up to Procurement Requests:

  • Monitor and track procurement requests from initiation to completion.
  • Follow up with internal departments and external suppliers to ensure timely processing and delivery of requested items or services.
  • Maintain records and documentation of all procurement requests and approvals.


Source new Vendors


Responsibilities

  • Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, or a related field preferred.
  • Proven experience in procurement, contract management, or a similar role.
  • Strong attention to detail and excellent organizational skills.
  • Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and procurement software.
  • Effective communication and negotiation skills.
  • Knowledge of procurement laws and regulations is a plus.

JOB PROFILE

  • Design and implement visually appealing and user-friendly UIs.
  • Develop, test, and uphold the backend infrastructure for applications and websites.
  • Seamlessly incorporate data from diverse backends and APIs into applications and websites.
  • Enforce robust information security protocols to safeguard user data.
  • Enhance application and website functionality for optimal speed and scalability.
  • Regularly update and refine existing applications and websites to meet organizational or client requirements.
  • Stay abreast with cutting-edge trends and technologies in the web and application development sector.


EDUCATIONAL AND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS

  • Hold a Bachelorâ€™s degree or its equivalent in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related discipline.
  • At least two years of experience in a role akin to a Full Stack Web Developer.
  • Fluent in English, both oral and written.
  • Proficient in programming languages like JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and server-side languages such as Node.js, Python, Ruby, or PHP.
  • Skilled in front-end frameworks including React, Angular, or Vue.js.
  • Solid understanding of database systems and SQL.
  • Capable of crafting engaging and responsive user interfaces using front-end technologies like CSS pre-processors (e.g., SASS).
  • Proficient in API usage and adept at creating comprehensive API documentation using tools like Postman.
  • Experienced in database management and optimization with a focus on effective database architecture.
  • Team player with excellent communication skills for diverse stakeholder engagement.
  • Exceptional problem-solving abilities and a penchant for self-directed learning.
  • Familiar with web security measures and experienced in fortifying applications against security vulnerabilities.


ADDITIONAL SKILLS SOUGHT

  • Exceptional ability to multitask and thrive in dynamic, high-pressure environments.
  • Highly self-driven with efficient self-management skills.
  • Background in Cloud Technologies, DevOps, CMS, and Web Security.
  • Certifications in web development from recognized bodies like AWS Certified Developer or Google Professional are advantageous.

sector: Teknologi, Informasi, Internet, dan Internet Of Things (IoT)
description:
Job Description

  1. Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback.
  2. Develop and execute test cases and test scripts to ensure the quality of our software products.
  3. Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities.
  4. Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs.
  5. Conduct regression testing to verify that previously identified issues have been resolved.
  6. Perform ad hoc testing as necessary to identify potential issues.


Job Requirements

  1. Undergraduate students, Diploma students, or Fresh Graduate from IT or other related majors.
  2. Knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes.
  3. Able in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases.
  4. Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases.
  5. Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts.


Placement

  1. Halim, East Jakarta
  2. Umbulharjo, Yogyakarta


Benefits

  1. Certificate and Allowance.
  2. Career Path.
  3. 24 Hour Office (AC + WiFi).
  4. Meal allowances.
  5. Dormitory (if required).
  6. Round-trip Economy Class Ticket Train.
  7. Start-up Mentoring.
  8. Work in Team Experiences.
  9. Extended Network.


Duration of employment

  1. Minimum 4 months.


Beginning of employment

  1. Flexible can be adjusted according to campus policy.

A business analyst works as a liaison among stakeholders to elicit, analyse, communicate, and validate requirements for changes to business processes, policies, and information systems. The business analyst understands business problems and opportunities in the context of the requirements and recommends solutions that enable the organisation to achieve its goals.


This role involves:


  • Requirement gathering and analysis that is specific and caters to the clientâ€™s expectations and needs.
  • Providing the smartest solutions to solve the clientâ€™s problems.
  • Monitoring all the phases of the project cycle with care.
  • Building a collaborative relationship between users, customers and stakeholders and the technical team.
  • Maintaining active and clear communication with the client and the team.
  • Providing concise documentation related to projects.


General Requirements:


  • At least a bachelor's degree, with an IT or Engineering specialisation.
  • Minimum 3 years of experience as a business analyst within software development. Technical experience or background dealing with software development projects.
  • Adequate IT knowledge to be able to interact with developers on a similar professional level. Familiarity with databases and at least able to understand the differences between backend, frontend, and other roles in software development.
  • Able to interpret business problems and work towards an IT solution.
  • Excellent people skills.
  • Understanding of the software engineering process
  • Must be adept at translating business requirements into technical requirements, including the usage of analysis and modelling tools.
  • Must be a quick learner. You will need to master new systems on a regular basis and with minimal supervision
  • Good written and oral communication, including technical writing.
  • Fluent in English â€” both written and oral skills
  • Able to work in teams with minimal supervision.
  • Experienced at web and mobile application product development.
  • Experience of agile development methodologies (Scrum, Kanban, etc.).
  • A good eye for UI/UX design

Job Types: Full-time, Contract

Contract length: 12 months

Salary: Rp5,000,000 - Rp7,000,000 per month

Ability to commute/relocate:

Jakarta: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)

Deskripsi Pekerjaan

  1. Mengkoordinasikan proyek: Menyusun dan mengelola jadwal proyek, mengawasi aktivitas tim proyek, dan memastikan progres proyek sesuai dengan target yang ditetapkan.
  2. Pelaporan dan Evaluasi: Memantau dan melaporkan kemajuan proyek kepada pihak terkait, mengevaluasi risiko yang terkait dengan proyek, dan menyusun laporan penyelesaian proyek setelah proyek selesai.
  3. Komunikasi: Menjaga komunikasi yang efektif dengan semua pihak terkait, termasuk tim proyek, manajemen perusahaan, dan mitra proyek, untuk memastikan pemahaman yang jelas tentang tujuan proyek dan mengatasi masalah yang mungkin timbul.
  4. Manajemen Risiko: Mengidentifikasi dan mengelola risiko proyek, serta mengembangkan strategi pengurangan risiko untuk memastikan kelancaran proyek.
  5. Pemecahan Masalah: Mengatasi masalah dan tantangan yang mungkin muncul selama proyek, dan menemukan solusi yang efektif untuk memastikan progres proyek tetap berjalan.
  6. Standar Kualitas: Memastikan bahwa proyek selesai sesuai dengan standar kualitas yang ditetapkan, dan melakukan pengawasan terhadap kontrol kualitas selama siklus proyek.


Kualifikasi

  1. Pendidikan: Gelar sarjana di bidang terkait, seperti manajemen proyek, teknik, atau bisnis, diutamakan.
  2. Pengalaman: Pengalaman kerja sebagai koordinator proyek atau peran terkait di industri yang relevan akan menjadi nilai tambah.
  3. Keterampilan Komunikasi: Kemampuan komunikasi yang baik, baik lisan maupun tulisan, untuk berinteraksi dengan berbagai pihak terkait dan mengkoordinasikan tim proyek.
  4. Manajemen Waktu: Kemampuan yang baik dalam mengelola waktu, mengatur prioritas, dan memenuhi tenggat waktu yang ditetapkan.
  5. Keterampilan Teknis: Familiaritas dengan alat dan metodologi manajemen proyek, seperti Microsoft Project atau Agile, akan dihargai.
  6. Kemampuan Analitis: Kemampuan analitis yang kuat untuk mengidentifikasi dan mengatasi masalah proyek, serta melakukan evaluasi risiko.
  7. Kerjasama Tim: Kemampuan untuk bekerja dalam tim, membangun hubungan yang baik dengan anggota tim, dan memfasilitasi kolaborasi yang efektif.
  8. Ketekunan dan Ketelitian: Kemampuan untuk tetap fokus, mengatasi tekanan, dan bekerja secara teliti untuk mencapai tujuan proyek.

PT Solusi Kampus Indonesia (eCampuz) merupakan unit usaha di bidang teknologi informasi yang berafiliasi dengan Universitas Gadjah Mada (UGM) dan sejak 27 Mei 2022 berkembang bersama PT Global Sukses Solusi Tbk (RUN System) sebagai bagian dari share holder untuk lebih mendekatkan pendidikan tinggi dengan dunia industri. eCampuz lahir dalam ekosistem pendidikan tinggi sejak 18 tahun silam, bersama unit usaha teknologi dibawah naungan PT Gama Multi Usaha Mandiri milik UGM sebagai sumber pengetahuan bisnis proses pengelolaan perguruan tinggi terbaik di Indonesia. Berbagai jenis dan variasi digitalisasi pendidikan tinggi telah kami tangani, mulai dari universitas, institut, sekolah tinggi, akademi, dan politeknik.

Saat ini, kami membuka kesempatan bagi individu yang dinamis, bersemangat, dan berorientasi pada hasil untuk bergabung dengan tim kami sebagai Application Specialist .

software life project cyclepublic speakingdeadlineTesting aplikasi (black box testing)

  • Membuat dokumentasi aplikasi dan proyek, seperti  flowchart, simple mockup user manual, dan UAT forum.
  • Menjalin komunikasi dan relasi dengan klien & tim internal.
  • Melaksanakan requirement gathering (pengumpulan kebutuhan pengguna).
  • Melakukan pelatihan pengguna baik secara online maupun offline.

  5. Work cross-functionally with Operations, Software Engineer, IT Infrastuctur, Commercial teams to improve products and processes.


Job Spesification :

  1. Bachelorâ€™s degree, Diploma, Vocational School in Information Technology, Computer Science, Mathematics, Accounting or equivalent.
  2. At least 1 year experience in system support.
  3. Has experience with Accounting system is plus value.
  4. Fresh Graduates are welcome.
  5. Has knowledge of Database/SQL is plus value.
  6. Multitaskers with strong organizational skills and good attention to detail.
  7. Willingness to work in a highly collaborative atmosphere and within a team.
  8. Respect for deadlines and desire for keeping the high work quality.

Responsibility :

  1. Menerima keluhan dari client melalui whatsapp, kontak, email dan telepon.
  2. Mengadakan proses evaluasi dengan commercial jika ada masalah teknis berdasarkan feedback dari client.
  3. Mencatat keluhan client ke funnel tiket ( Open Project ).
  4. Melakukan analisis tiket awal untuk menentukan urgensi dan kategori tiket masuk.
  5. Handling meeting dengan client jika ada detail tiket yang belum jelas dari sisi tech ops.
  6. Melakukan penanganan tiket masuk sesuai dengan urutan tiket masuk atau tingkat urgensi tiket tersebut.
  7. Diskusikan detail tiket dengan divisi tech ops dan infra untuk mempercepat penyelesaian tiket.
